text.66: [03] 1. dve dvekaa-nekesu naamasmaa si yo, a.m yo, naa hi, sa na.m,   smaa hi, sa na.m, smi.m su.
text.324: [03] 8. ore pari vati paare majjhe he.t.thuddhaa dhonto vaa cha.t.thiyaa.
text.339: [03] 18. tattha gahetvaa tena paharitvaa yuddhe saruupa.m.
text.467: [03] 27. tamassa sippa.m siila.m pa.nya.m pahara.na.m payojana.m.
text.469: [03] 29. tena kata.m kiita.m baddhamabhisa"nkhata.m sa.msa.t.tha.m hata.m hanti jita.m   jayati dibbati kha.nati tarati carati vahati jiivati.
text.587: [03] 127. kosajjaajjava paarisajja sohajja maddavaarissaasabhaaja~n~na theyya   baahusaccaa.
text.664: [03] 58. .thaa-sa, vasa, silisa, sii, ruha, jara, janiihi.
text.667: [03] 61. tu.m taaye tave bhaave bhavissati kriyaaya.m tadatthaaya.m.
text.730: [03] 124. disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhaa.
text.788: [03] 1. vattamaane ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
text.789: [03] 2. bhavissati ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssaami ssaama,   ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssa.m ssaamhe.
text.791: [03] 4. bhuute ii u.m, o ttha, i.m mhaa, aa uu, se vha.m, a mhe.
text.792: [03] 5. anajjatane aa uu, o ttha, a mhaa, ttha tthu.m, se vha.m, i.m muse.
text.793: [03] 6. parokkhe a u, e ttha, a mha, ttha re, ttho vho, i mhe.
text.794: [03] 7. eyyaado vaa tipattiya.m ssaa ssa.msu, sse ssatha, ssa.m ssaamhaa,   ssatha ssi.msu, ssase ssavhe, ssi.m ssaamhase.
text.795: [03] 8. hetuphalesveyya eyyu.m, eyyaasi eyyaatha, eyyaami eyyaama, etha   era.m, etho eyyaavho, eyya.m eyyaamhe.
text.797: [03] 10. tu antu, hi tha, mima, ta.m anta.m, ssu vho, e aamadhasa.
text.837: [03] 50. atthiteyyaadicchanna.m sa su sa satha sa.m saama.
text.868: [03] 1. cara ^a^M0.0043^ea^ dara kara raha jana sana tala saada saadha   kasaasa ca.taa ya vaahi .nu.
text.869: [03] 2. bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana ba.mha   kambamba cakkha bhikkha sa.mkindanda yaja pa.taa.naasa vasa pasa   pa.msa bandhaa u.
text.872: [03] 5. tapusa vidha kura putha mudaa ku.
text.877: [03] 10. vapa vara vasa rasa nabha hara hana pa.naa ii.na.
text.882: [03] 14. i bhii kaa karaara vaka saka vaahi ko.
text.900: [03] 32. aja vaja muda gada gamaa gaka.
text.912: [03] 43. asa masa vasa kuca kacaa cho.
text.930: [03] 60. tija ^a^M0.0046^ea^ kasa tasa dakkhaa ki.no jassa kho ca.
text.941: [03] 70. dhaahisi tana jana jara gama sacaa tu.
text.966: [03] 95. ruda khuda muda mada chida suuda sapa kamaa daka.
text.972: [03] 101. varaara kara tara dara yamaajja mithasakaa kuno.
text.988: [03] 116. khipa supa nii suu puuhi paka.
text.996: [03] 124. kara sara sala kala valla vasaa abho.
text.1008: [03] 136. khii su vii yaa gaa hi saa luu khu hu mara dhara kara ghara jamaa   ma saamaa mo.
text.1016: [03] 143. khii si sinii sii su vii ku suu hi raka.
text.1020: [03] 147. manda"nka sasaa sa ma dha cataa uro.
text.1042: [03] 169. sara vasa kalaa kiiro vassu.ta ca.
text.1055: [03] 182. ma"nga kama samba saba saka vasa visa keva kala palla ka.tha pa.ta   ku.n.da ma.n.daa alo.
text.1062: [03] 189. ana sana kala kuka sa.tha mahaa ilo.
text.1086: [03] 213. sasaasa vasa visa hana vana manaana kamaa so.
text.1090: [03] 217. ve taa ta yu panaa la kala camaa aso.
text.1091: [03] 218. vaya diva kara kare hya sa.nasakapaasa kasaa.
text.1098: [03] 225. khii mi pii cu maa vaa kaahi .lo ussa vaa diigho ca.
text.1110: [03] akaaraadayo niggahiitantaa tecattaaliisa-kkharaa va.n.naa naama  honti. a aa i ii u uu e e o o, ka kha ga gha "na ca cha  ja jha ~n~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra  la va sa ha .la a.m. tena kvattho? ``e o na mava.n.ne'' 1. 37.  titaaliisaabhi vacana.m katthaci va.n.nalopa.m ~naapeti. tena  `pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso'tiaadi siddha.m.
text.1112: [03] tatthaadimhi dasa va.n.naa saraa naama honti. tena kvattho?  ``saro lopo sare'' 1, 26 iccaadi.
text.1113: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ dvedve sava.n.naa. tesu dvedve saraa sava.n.naa naama  honti. tena kvattho? ``va.n.naparena sava.n.nopi'' 1, 24.
text.1115: [03] tesu ^a^M0.0055^ea^ dviisu yo yo pubbo, so so rassasa~n~no  hoti. tesu e.o.sa.myogato pubbaava dissanti. tena kvattho?  ``rasso vaa'' 2,62 iccaadi.
text.1117: [03] te sveva dviisuyo yo paro, so so diighasa~n~no hoti. tena  kvattho? ``yo lo panisu diigho'' 2,88 iccaadi.
text.1119: [03] kakaaraadayo va.n.naa niggahiitapariyantaa bya~njanasa~n~naahonti.  tena kvattho? ``bya~njane diigharassaa'' 1,33 iccaadi.
text.1121: [03] kaadayo pa~nca pa~ncakaa vagga, naama honti. tena kvattho?  ``vagge vagganto'' 1,41 iccaadi.
text.1123: [03] yvaaya.m va.n.no bindumatto, so niggahiitasa~n~no hoti. tena  kvattho? ``niggahiita.m'' 1,38 icaadi. garusa~n~naakara.na.m  anvatthasa~n~nattha.m.
text.1125: [03] naama.m paa.tipadika.m, tassaante vattamaanaa iva.n.nuva.n.naa jhalasa~n~naa  honti yathaakkama.m. tena kvattho? ``jhalaa vaa'' 2,111 iccaadi.
text.1127: [03] itthiya.m vattamaanassa naamassa-nte vattamaanaa iva.n.nuva.n.naa  pasa~n~naa honti. tena kvattho? ye passiva.n.nassa'' 2,116 iccaadi.
text.1129: [03] ^b^itthiya.m^eb^ vattamaanassa naamassa-nte vatthamaano aakaaro  ghasa~n~no hoti. tena kvattho? ``ghabrahmaadite'' 2,60 iccaadi.
text.1135: [03] ya.m visesana.m, tadantassa vidhi ~naatabbo ``ato yona.m .taa.te''  2,41 naraanare.
text.1137: [03] sattamiiniddese ^a^M0.0057^ea^ pubbasseva kaariya.m ~naatabba.m ``saro  lopo sare'' 1,26 ve.lagga.m. `tamaha'ntiidha kasmaa na hoti?,  saretopasilesikaadhaaro tatthetaava vuccate `pubbasseva hoti na  parassaa'ti.
text.1139: [03] pa~ncamiiniddese parassa kaariya.m ~naatabba.m ``atoyona.m .taa.te''  2,41 naraanare. idha na hota.m `jantuho anattaa'. idha kasmaa na  hoti? osakhyo, anantare katatthataaya na byavahitassa kaariya.m.
text.1141: [03] parassa ssissamaana.m kaariyamaadiva.n.nassa ~naatabba.m ``ra  sa"nkhyaato vaa'' 3,103 terasa.
text.1143: [03] cha.t.thiiniddi.t.thassa ya.m kaariya.m, tadantassa va.n.nassa vi~n~neyya.m  ``raajassi naamhi'' 2,23 raajinaa.
text.1145: [03] "nakaaro anubandho yassa, so antassa hoti ``gossaa va"na''  1,32 gavaassa.m.
text.1147: [03] .takaaro-nubandho ^a^M0.0058^ea^ yassa, so-nekakkharo caadeso  sabbassa hoti ``imassaanitthiya.m .te'' 2,128 esu,  ``naamha-nimi'' 2,126 anena.
text.1149: [03] cha.t.thiiniddi.t.thassa ~naanubandhakaanubandhaa aadyantaa honti ``bruuto  tissii~na'' 6,36 braviiti, ``bhuussa vuka'' 6,17 babhuuva.
text.1151: [03] makaaro-nubandho yassa, so saraa namantaa saraa paro hoti  ``ma~nca rudhaadiina.m'' 5-19 rundhati.
text.1153: [03] dvinna.m saavakaasaanamekatthappasa"nge paro hoti. yathaa dvinna.m  ti.n.na.m vaapurisaana.m sahappattiya.m paro, so ca (gacchati) tva.m ca  (gacchasi, tumhe) gacchatha. so ca (gacchati,) tva.m ca (gacchasi,)  aha.m ca (gacchaami, maya.m) gacchaama.
text.1156: [03] sa"nketaggaha.na.m ki.m? pakatiyaadisamudaayassaanubandhataa maa  hotuuti, anavayavohi samudaayo... samudaayaruupattaayeva.
text.1157: [03] anavayavaggaha.na.m ki.m? ``atena'' 2-108 janena. iminaava  lopassaavagatattaa naanubandhalopaaya vacanamaaraddha.m.
text.1159: [03] va.n.nasaddo ^a^M0.0059^ea^ paro yasmaa tena sava.n.nopi gayhati  sa.mca ruupa.m ``yuva.n.naanameo luttaa'' 1-29 vaakerita.m, samonaa.
text.1161: [03] vantvaadisambandhiiyevantu gayhati, ``ntantuuna.m nto yomhi  pa.thame'' 2-215 gu.navanto.
text.1165: [03] sare saro lopaniiyo hoti. tatri-me, saddhi-ndriya.m, nohe-ta.m,  bhikkhuno-vaado, sametaa-yasmaa, abhibhaa-yatana.m, puttaama-tthi,  asante-ttha.
text.1167: [03] saramhaa paro saro kvaci lopaniiyo hoti. so-pi, saava,  yato-daka.m, tato-va. kvaciitiki.m? saddhi-ndriya.m, ayamadhikaaro  aaparicchedaavasaanaa, tena naatippasa"ngo.
text.1169: [03] pubbaparasaraa dvepi vaa kvaci na lupyante, lataa iva, late-va,  lataa-va.
text.1171: [03] luttaa ^a^M0.0060^ea^ saraa paresa.m iva.n.nuva.n.naana.m eo honti vaa  yathaakkama.m.
text.1172: [03] tasse-da.m, vaate-rita.m, no-peti, vaamo-ruu, ate-va~n~nehi, vo-daka.m.  katha.m ``paccorasmi''nti? yogavibhaagaa. vaatveva? tassida.m.
text.1175: [03] sare pare iva.n.nuva.n.naana.m yakaaravakaaraa honti vaa yathaakkama.m.  byaakato, iccassa, ajjhi.namutto, svaagata.m, svaapanalaanila.m, vaatveva?  iti-ssa. kvacitveva? yaanii-dha, suu-pa.t.thita.m.
text.1177: [03] ^b^eona.m^eb^yavaayonti vaa sare yathaakkama.m. tyajja te-jja,  svaaha.m so-ha.m. kvacitveva? puttaama-tthi, asante-ttha.
text.1179: [03] sare gossa ava"na hoti. gavaa-ssa.m. `yathariiva, tatharive'ti  nipaataava, `bhusaamive'ti ivasaddo evattho.
text.1181: [03] rassadiighaana.m ^a^M0.0061^ea^ kvaci diigharassaa honti bya~njane.  tatraa-ya.m, muniicare, sammadeva, maalabhaarii.
text.1183: [03] saramhaa parassa bya~njanassa kvaci dve ruupaani honti. paggaho.  saramhaati ki.m? ta.m kha.na.m.
text.1185: [03] catutthadutiyesu paresvesa.m catutthadutiyaana.m tabbagge tatiya pa.thamaa  honti. paccaasatthyaa, nigghoso, akkhanti, bojjha"ngaa, setacchatta.m,  da.d.dho, ni.t.thaana.m, mahaddhano, yasatthero, apphu.ta.m, abbhuggato. esviiti  ki.m? thero. esanti ki.m? pattho.
text.1187: [03] evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vaa. itveva, icceva. eveti  ki.m? iccaaha.
text.1189: [03] eona.m va.n.ne kvaci a hoti vaa. disvaa yaacaka maagate,  akaramhasa te, esa attho, esa dhammo, aggamakkhaayati, svaatana.m  ^a^M0.0062^ea^, hiyyattana.m, karassu. vaatveva? yaacake aagate eso  dhammo. va.n.neti ki.m? so.
text.1191: [03] niggahiitamaagamo hoti vaa kvaci. cakkhu.m udapaadi  cakkhuudapaadi, purima.m jaati.m purimajaati.m, kattabba.m kusala.m bahu.m.  ava.msirotiaadiisu nicca.m... vavatthitavibhaasattaa vaadhikaarassa,  saamattiyenaagamova, sa ca rassa sarasseva hoti... tassa  rassaanugatattaa.
text.1193: [03] niggahiitassa lopo hoti vaa kvaci. kyaaha.m kimaha.msaaratto  sa.mratto. salle kho-gantukaamo gantumanoti, aadiisu nicca.m.
text.1195: [03] niggahiitamhaa parassa sarassa lopo hoti vaa kvaci. tva.m-si  tvamasi.
text.1197: [03] niggahiitassa kho vagge vagganto vaa hoti paccaasattyaa.  ta"nkaroti ta.m karoti, ta~ncarati ta.m carati, ta.n.thaana.m ta.m .thaana.m, tandhana.m  ta.m dhana.m, tampaati ta.m paati. nicca.m padamajjhe gantvaa, kvaca~n~naatrapi  santi.t.thati.
text.1199: [03] ya ^a^M0.0063^ea^ eva hi saddesu niggahiitassa vaa ~no hoti.  ya~n~nadeva, ta~n~neva, ta~nhi, vaatveva? ya.m yadeva.
text.1201: [03] sa.msaddassa ya.m niggahiita.m tassa vaa ~no hoti yakaare. sa~n~namo  sa.myamo.
text.1203: [03] niggahiitassa mayadaa honti vaa sare kvaci. tamaha.m, tayida.m,  tadala.m. vaa tveva? ta.m aha.m.
text.1205: [03] ete mayadaa ca aagamaa honti sare vaa kvaci. tiva"ngika.m,  ito naayati, cinitvaa, tasmaatiha, niroja.m, puthageva, idhamaahu,  yathayida.m, attadattha.m. vaa tveva? attattha.m. `atippago kho  taavaa'ti-pa.thamanto pagasaddova.
text.1207: [03] chasaddaa parassa sarassa .lakaaro aagamo hoti vaa. cha.la"nga.m,  cha.laayatana.m. vaatveva? chaabhi~n~naa.
text.1209: [03] tadaminaadiini ^a^M0.0064^ea^ saadhuuni bhavanti. ta.m iminaa  tadaminaa, saki.m aagaamii sakadaagaamii, eka.m idha aha.m ekamidaaha.m,  sa.mvidhaaya avahaaro sa.mvidaavahaaro, vaarino vaahako valaahako,  jiivanassa muuto jiimuuto, chavassa sayana.m susaana.m, uddha.m khamassa  udukkhala.m, pisitaaso pisaaco, mahiya.m ravatiiti mayuuro, evama~n~nepi  payogato-nugantabbaa, paresa.m pisodaraadimiveda.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.1211: [03] tavaggavara.naana.m kvaci cavaggabaya~naa honti yathaakkama.m yakaare.  apucca.n.dataaya, taccha.m, yajjeva.m, ajjhatta.m, tha~n~na.m, dibba.m, payyosanaa,  pokkhara~n~no. kvacitveva? rattyaa
text.1213: [03] vaggalasehi parassa yakaarassa kvaci te vaggalasaa honti.
text.1214: [03] sakkate, paccate, a.t.tate, kuppate, phallate, assate. kvacitveva?  kyaaha.m.
text.1218: [03] hassa vipallaaso hoti vaa vakaare. bavhaabaadho bavhaabaadho.
text.1220: [03] tathanaraana.m ^a^M0.0065^ea^ .ta.tha.nalaa honti vaa. dukka.ta.m, a.t.thakathaa,  gaha.na.m, paligho, palaayati. vaatveva? dukkata.m. kvacitveva? sugato.
text.1222: [03] sa.myogassa yo aadiibhuuto-vayavo tassa vaa kvaci lopo hoti.  puppha.m-saa jaayate-gini.
text.1224: [03] vicchaayamaabhikkha~n~ne ca ya.m vattate, tassa dve ruupaani honti.  kriyaaya gu.nena dabbena vaa bhinne atthe byaapitumicchaa vicchaa.  rukkha.m rukkha.m si~ncati, gaamo gaamo rama.niiyo, gaame gaame paaniiya.m,  gehe gehe issaro, rasa.m rasa.m bhakkhayati, kiriya.m kiriyamaarabhate.
text.1225: [03] atthiyevaa-nupubbiyepi vicchaa muule muule thuulaa, agge agge  sukhumaa, yadi hi ettha muulaggabhedo na siyaa, aanupubbiyampi na  bhaveyya. maasaka.m maasaka.m imamhaa kahaapa.naa bhavanthaana.m dvinna.m dehiiti  maasaka.m maasakamiccetasmaa vicchaagamyate, saddantarato pana imamhaa  kahaapa.naati avadhaara.na.m. pubba.m pubba.m pupphanti, pa.thama.m pa.thama.m  paccantiityatraapi vicchaava. ime ubho a.d.dhaa kataraa kataraa esa.m  dvinnama.d.dhataa, sabbe ime a.d.dhaa katamaa katamaa imesa.m a.d.dhutaa ihaapi  ^a^M0.0066^ea^ vicchaava. aabhikkha~n~na.m ponopu~n~na.m pacati pacati,  papacati papacati, lunaahi lunaahitvevaaya.m lunaati, bhutvaa bhutvaa  gacchati, pa.tapa.taa karoti, pa.tapa.taayati.
text.1227: [03] vicchaayamekassa dvitte pubbassa syaadilopo hoti. ekekassa.  katha.m matthakamatthakenaati? `syaadilopo pubbassaa'ti yogavibhaagaa,  naacaatippasa"ngo yogavibhaagaa i.t.thappasiddhiiti.
text.1229: [03] sabbaadiina.m viitihaare dve bhavanti pubbassa syaadilopo ca.  a~n~nama~n~nassa bhojakaa, itariitarassa bhojakaa.
text.1231: [03] turitenaapaayahetupadassana.m sambhamo, tasmi.msati vatthu yaavantehi  saddehi so-ttho vi~n~naayate, taavanto saddaa payujjante. sappo sappo  sappo, bujjhassu bujjhassu bujjhassu, bhinno bhikkhusa"ngho bhinno  bhikkhusa"ngho.
text.1233: [03] ayamadhikaaro aasatthaparisamattiyaa. tena naatippasa"ngo  i.t.thappasiddhi ca.
text.1237: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ dve ^a^M0.0067^ea^ dve-kaanekesu naamasmaa si yo,  a.m yo, naa hi, sa na.m, smaa hi, sa na.m, smi.m su.
text.1238: [03] etesa.m dve dve honti ekaanekatthesu vattamaanato naamasmaa. muni  munayo, muni.m munayo, muninaa muniihi, munissa muniina.m, munismaa  muniihi, munissa muniina.m, munismi.m muniisu, eva.m kumaarii kumaariyo,  ka~n~naa ka~n~naayoti. etaani satta dukaani satta vibhattiyo vibhaago  vibhatiiti katvaa, ettha siamitii-kaaraa-kaaraa ``kima.m sisu''  2,200 ti sa.mketatthaa.
text.1240: [03] kariiyati kattu kiriyaayaa-bhisambandhiiyatiiti kamma.m, tasmi.m  dutiyaavibhatti hota.m. ka.ta.m karoti, odana.m pacati, aadicca.m passati.
text.1241: [03] `odano paccatii'ti odanasaddato kammataa nappatiiyate,  ki~ncarahi? aakhyaatato. `ka.ta.m karoti vipula.m dassaniiya'nti  attheva gu.nayuttassa kammataa, icchitepi kammattaava dutiyaa siddhaa gaavu.m  payo dohati, gomanta.m gaava.m yaacati, gaavamavarundhati vaja.m, maa.navaka.m  magga.m pucchati, gomanta.m gaava.m bhikkhate, rukkhamavacinaati phalaani,  sissa.m dhamma.m bruute, sissa.m dhammamanusaasatiiti. eva.m anicchitepi  ahi.m la"nghayati, visa.m bhakkheti. ya.mnevicchita.m naapi ^a^M0.0068^ea^  anicchita.m, tatthaapi dutiyaa siddhaa. gaama.m gacchanto  rukkhamuulamupasappati.
text.1242: [03] pathavi.m adhisessati, gaamamadhiti.t.thati,  rukkhamajjhaasatetiadhisii.thaasaana.mpayoge-dhikara.ne kammavacanicchaa,  vatticchaato hi kaarakaani honti. ta.m yathaa-valaahakaa vijjotate,  valaahakassa vijjotate, valaahako vijjotate, valaahake vijjotate,  valaahakena vijjotateti. evamabhinivisassa vaa dhammamabhinivisate  dhamme vaa.
text.1243: [03] tathaa upanvajjhaavasassaabhojana nivuttivacanassa gaamamupavasati,  ga, mamanuvasati, pabbatamadhivasati, gharamaavasati. abhojananivutti  vacanassaati ki.m? gaame upavasati, bhojananivutti.m karotiiti attho.  tappaanaacaarepi kammattaava dutiyaa siyaa nadimpivati, gaama.m carati,  eva.m `sace ma.m aalapissatii'tiaadiisupi. vihitaava patidhayoge  dutiyaa -- `pa.tibhantu ta.m cunda bojjha"ngaa'ti. ta.m pati bojjha"ngaa  bhaasantuuti attho, yadaatu dhaatunaayutto pati, tadaa tenaa-yogaa sambandhe  cha.t.thiiva `tassa nappa.tibhaatii'ti. akkhe dibbati, akkhehi dibbati,  akkhesu dibbatiiti kammakara.naadhikara.navacanicchaa.
text.1245: [03] kiriyaa, gu.na, dabbehi saakallena kaaladdhaana.m sambandho  accantasa.myogo. tasmi.m vi~n~naayamaane kaalasaddehi addhaaddehi ca  dutiyaa hoti. maasamadhiite, maasa.m kalyaa.ni, maasa.m ^a^M0.0069^ea^  gu.ladhaanaa, kosamadhiite, kosa.m ku.tilaa nadii, kosa.m pabbato.  acantasa.myogeti ki.m? maasassa dviihamadhiite, kosassekadese pabbato.
text.1246: [03] pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa, ima.m ratti.m  cattaaro mahaaraajaati evamaadiisu kaalavaacii hi accantasa.myogattaava  dutiyaa siddhaa. vibhattivipallaasenapi vaa bahula.mvidhaanaa.
text.1247: [03] phalappattiya.m kiriyaaparisamattyapavaggo, tasmi.m vi~n~naayamaane  kaaladdhaana.m kiriyaayaaccantasa.myoge tatiyaabhimataa, saapi kara.nattaava  siddhaa `maasenaanuvaako-dhiito, kosenaanuvaako-dhiito'ti. anapavaggetu  asaadhakatamattaakara.nattaabhaave dutiyaava `maasamadhiito-nuvaako, na caane  na gahito'ti.
text.1248: [03] kaarakamajjhe ye kaaladdhaanavaacino, tato sattamiipa~ncamiyo  abhimataa `ajja bhutvaa devadatto dvihe bhu~njissati, dviihaa bhu~njissati,  atra.t.tho-yamissaaso kose lakkha.m vijjhati, kosaa lakkha.m  vijjhatii'ti, taapiiha sakasakakaarakavacanicchaayeva siddhaa.
text.1250: [03] gamanatthaana.m bodhatthaana.m aahaaratthaana.m saddatthaanamakammakaana.m  bhajjaadiina~nca payojje kattari dutiyaa hoti. saamatthiyaa ca  payojakabyaapaarena kammataavassa hotiiti patiiyate. gamayati maa.navaka.m  gaama.m, yaapayati maa.navaka.m gaama.m, bodhayati maa.navaka.m dhamma.m, vedayati  maa.navaka.m dhamma.m, bhojayati maa.na-vaka.m ^a^M0.0070^ea^ modaka.m, aasayati  maa.navaka.m modaka.m, ajjhaapayati maa.navaka.m veda.m, paa.thayati maa.navaka.m veda.m,  aasayati devadatta.m, saayayati devadatta.m, a~n~na.m bhajjaapeti, a~n~na.m  ko.t.taapeti, a~n~na.m santharaapeti. etesamevaati ki.m? paaceti odana.m  devadattena ya~n~nadatto. payojjeti ki.m? gacchati devadatto. yadaa  carahi gamayati devadatta.m ya~n~nadatto, tamaparo payojeti, tadaa gamayati  devadatta.m ya~n~nadatteneti bhavitabba.m ... gamayatissaa-gamanatthattaa.
text.1252: [03] haraadiina.m payojje kattari dutiyaa hoti vaa. haareti bhaara.m  devadatta.m devadatteneti vaa, ajjhohaareti sattu.m devadatta.m devadatteneti vaa,  kaareti ka.ta.m devadatta.m devadatteneti vaa dassayate jana.m raaja.m janeneti  vaa, abhivaadayate guru.m devadatta.m devadatteneti vaa.
text.1254: [03] khaadaadiina.m payojje kattari dutiyaa na hoti. khaadayati  devadattena, aadayati devadattena, avha, payati devadattena, saddaayayati  devadattena, kandayati devadattena, naayayati devadattena.
text.1255: [03] (1) vahissaaniyantuke. vaahayati bhaara.m devadattena  aniyantuketi ki.m? vaaha-yati bhaara.m baliibadde.
text.1256: [03] (2) bhakkhissaahi.m ^a^M0.0071^ea^ saaya.m. bhakkhayati modake  devadattena. ahi.msaayanti ki.m? bhakkhayati baliibadde sassa.m.
text.1258: [03] dhiiaadiihi yuttato dutiyaa hoti. dhiratthu ma.m puutikaaya.m,  antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca naalanda.m, samaadhaanamantarena,  mucalindamabhito saramiccaadi, cha.t.thiyaapavaado-ya.m.
text.1260: [03] lakkha.naadiisvatthesvabhinaa yuttamhaa dutiyaa mahaati. rukkhamabhi  vijjotate vijju, saadhu devadatto maataramabhi, rukkha.m rukkhamabhiti.t.thati.
text.1262: [03] patipariihi yuttamhaa lakkha.naadiisu bhaage catthe dutiyaa hoti.  rukkha.m pati vijjotate vijju, saadhu devadatto maatara.m pati, rukkha.m  rukkha.m pati ti.t.thati, yadettha ma.m pati siyaa. rukkha.m pari vijjotate  vijju, saadhu devadatto maatara.m pari, rukkha.m rukkha.m pari ti.t.thati, yadettha  ma.m pari siyaa.
text.1264: [03] lakkha.naadiisvatthesvanunaa yuttamhaa dutiyaa hoti. rukkhamanu  vijjotate vijju, saccakiriyamanu vu.t.thi paavassi, hetu ca lakkha.na.m  bhavati, saadhu devadatto maataramanu, rukkha.m rukkhamanu ti.t.thati, yadettha  ma.m anu siyaa.
text.1266: [03] sahatthe-nunaa ^a^M0.0072^ea^ yuttamhaa dutiyaa hoti. pabbatamanu  senaa ti.t.thati.
text.1268: [03] hiinatthe-nunaa yuttamhaa dutiyaa hoti. anu saariputta.m  pa~n~navanto.
text.1270: [03] hiinatthe upena yuttamhaa dutiyaa hoti. upa saariputta.m  pa~n~navantho.
text.1272: [03] aadhikyatthe upena yuttamhaa sattamii hoti. upa khaariya.m do.no.
text.1274: [03] saamibhaavatthe-dhinaa yuttamhaa sattamii hoti. adhi brahmadatte  pa~ncaalaa, adhi pa~ncaalesu brahmadatto.
text.1276: [03] kattari kara.ne ca kaarake tatiyaa hoti. purisena kata.m,  asinaa chindati. pakatiyaa-bhiruupo, gotthena gotamo, sumedho naama  naamena, jaatiyaa sattavassikoti bhuudhaatussa sambhavaa kara.ne eva  tatiyaa. eva.m samena dhaavati visamena ^a^M0.0073^ea^ dhaavati,  dvido.nena dha~n~na.m ki.naati, pa~ncakena pasavo ki.naatiiti.
text.1278: [03] sahatthena yoge tatiyaa siyaa. puttena saha gato, puttena saddhi.m  aagato, tatiyaapi cha.t.thiiva appadhaane eva bhavati.
text.1280: [03] lakkha.ne vattamaanato tatiyaa siyaa. tida.n.dakena  paribbaajakamaddakkhii, akkhinaa kaa.no, tena hi a"ngena a"ngino  vikaaro lakkhiiyate.
text.1282: [03] takkiriyaa yogge tatiyaa siyaa. annena vasati, vijjaaya  yaso.
text.1284: [03] i.ne hetumhi pa~ncamii hoti vaa. satasmaa baddho, satena vaa.
text.1286: [03] para"ngabhuute hetumhi pa~ncamii hoti vaa. ja.lattaa baddho ja.lattena  vaa, pa~n~naaya mutto, hutvaa abhaavatoaniccaa, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa  vi~n~naa.nanirodho.
text.1288: [03] hetvatthavaaciihi yoge hetumhi cha.t.thii siyaa. udarassa hetu,  udarassa kaara.naa.
text.1290: [03] hetvatthehi yoge sabbaadiihi sabbaa vibhattiyo honti. ko  hetu, ka.m hetu.m, kena hetunaa, kassa hetussa, kasmaa hetusmaa, kassa  hetussa, kasmi.m hetusmi.m, ki.m kaara.na.m, kena kaara.nena, ki.m nimitta.m,  kena nimittena, ki.m payojana.m, kena payojanena iccevamaadi.  hetvatthehiitveva? kena kata.m.
text.1292: [03] yassa sammaa padiiyate tasmi.m catutthii siyaa. sa"nghassa dadaati.  aadhaaravivakkhaaya.m sattamiipi siyaa sa"nghe dehi.
text.1294: [03] tasse-da.m tadattha.m, tadatthabhaave jotaniiye naamasmaa catutthii siyaa.  siitassa pa.tighaataaya, atthaaya hitaaya (sukhaaya) devamanussaana.m,  naala.m daarabhara.naaya, yuupaaya daaru, paakaaya vajatiitvevamaadi.
text.1295: [03] kassa saadu.m na ruccabhi, maa-yasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha,  khamati sa"nghassa, bhattamassa nacchaadesiiti cha.t.thii sambandhavacanicchaaya.m,  na ceva.m virodho siyaa sadisaruupattaa, eva.mvidhesu ca sambandhassa  saddikaanumatattaa ^a^M0.0075^ea^, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesiiti atthamatte  pa.thamaa.
text.1297: [03] ra~n~no sata.m dhaareti, ra~n~no chatta.m dhaaretiiti sambandhe cha.t.thii, eva.m  ra~n~no silaaghate, ra~n~no hanute, ra~n~no upati.t.thate, ra~n~no sapate, devaapi  tassa pihayanti taadino, tassa kujjha mahaaviira, yadiha.m tassa  pakuppeyya.m, duhayati disaana.m megho, yo mittaana.m na duubhati, yo  appadu.t.thassa narassa dussati, kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami, issayanti  sama.naana.m titthiyaa, dhammena nayamaanaana.m kaa usuuyaa ra~n~no  bhaagyamaarajjhati, ra~n~no bhaagyamikkhate, tena yaacito ayaacito vaa  tassa gaavo pa.tisu.naati, gaavo aasu.naati, bhagavato paccassosu.m, hotu  patigi.naati, hotvanugi.naati, aarocayaami vo pativedayaami vo,  dhamma.m te desessaami, yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya, ala.m te idha  vaasena, ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, arahati mallo mallassaati.
text.1298: [03] jiivita.m ti.naayapi na ma~n~namaanoti taadatthya catutthii, ti.nena  yo attho tadatthaayapiiti attho, ``yo ca siita~nca u.nha~nca, ti.naa  bhiyyo na ma~n~nati'' ti.namiva jiivita.m ma~n~namaanoti savisayaava  vibhattiyo. saggaaya gacchatiiti taadatthye catutthii, yo hi sagga.m  gacchati tadattha.m tassa gamananti, kammavacanicchaayantu dutiyaava sagga.m  gacchatiiti.
text.1299: [03] aayu ^a^M0.0076^ea^ bhoto hotu, cira.m jiivita.m, bhadda.m kalyaa.na.m  attha.m payojana.m, kusala.m anaamaya.m, hita.m pathya.m sukha.m saata.m bhoto hotu,  saadhu sammuti metassa, puttassaavikareyya guyhamattha.m, tassa me sakko  paaturahosi, tassa pahi.neyya, bhikkhuuna.m duta.m paahesi, kappati sama.naana.m  aayogo, ekassa dvinna.m ti.n.na.m vaa pahoti, upama.m te karissaami,  a~njali.m te pagga.nhaami, tassa phaasu, lokassattho, namo te  purisaaja~n~na, sotthi tassa, ala.m mallo mallassa, samattho mallo  mallassa, tassa hita.m, tassa sukha.m, svaagata.m te mahaaraajaati sabbattha  cha.t.thii sambandhe, eva.mvidhama~n~nampeva vi~n~neyya.m yathaagama.m.
text.1301: [03] padatthaavadhismaa pa~ncamiivibhatti hoti. gaamasmaa aagacchatu,  eva.m corasmaa bhaayati, corasmaa uttasati, orasmaa taayati, corasmaa  rakkhatiiti, sace bhaayatha dukkhassa, pamaade bhayadassivaa, tasanti  da.n.dassaati cha.t.thii sattamiyopi honteva sambandhaadhaaravacanicchaaya.m.
text.1302: [03] ajjhenaa paraajeti, pa.tipakkhe paraajetiiti savisayaava  vibhattiyo. sace keva.t.tassa parajjissaamiiti cha.t.thiipi hoti  sambandhavacanicchaaya.m. yavehi gaavo vaareti, paapaa citta.m nivaaraye,  kaake rakkhati ta.n.dulaati savisayeva pa~ncamii. citta.m rakkhetha  medhaaviiti dutiyaava dissati kammatthe. upajjhaayaa antaradhaayati  ^a^M0.0077^ea^, upajjhaayaa adhite, kaamato jaayate sokoti savisaye  pa~ncamii.
text.1303: [03] tattheva-ntaradhaayi su, na.tassa su.noti, paduma.m tattha jaayethaati  sattamiicha.t.thiyopi honteva savisaye. himavantaa pabhavati ga"ngaa,  paa.naatipaataa viramassu khippa.m, a~n~no devadattaa, bhinno devadattaati  savisayeva pa~ncamii. eva.m aaraa so aasavakkhayaa, itaro devadattaa,  uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa, pubbo gaamaa, pubbeva sambodhaa, tato  para.m, tato aparena samayena, tatuttarinti. sambandhavacanicchaaya.m  cha.t.thiipi purato gaamassa, dakkhi.nato gaamassa, upari pabbatassa, he.t.thaa  paasaadassaati. paasaadamaaruyha pekkhati paasaadaa pekkhati, aasane  upavisitvaa pekkhati aasanaa pekkhatiiti avadhivacanicchaaya.m pa~ncamii.
text.1304: [03] pucchaanaakhyaanesu kuto bhava.m? paata.taliputtasmaati. tathaa  desakaalamaanepi paa.taliputtasmaa raajagaha.m satta yojanaani, sattasu  yojanesuuti vaa. eva.m ito ti.n.na.m maasaana-maccayenaati,  kicchaaladdhanti gu.ne pa~ncamii. kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi  kara.ne vaa tatiyaa. eva.m thokaa mutto, thokena muttoti. thoka.m  calatiiti kiriyaavisesane kammani dutiyaa.
text.1305: [03] duuranti katthayogepi savisayeva pa~ncamiicha.t.thiyo siyu.m, duura.m  gaamasmaa, antika.m gaamasmaa, duura.m gaamassa, antika.m gaamassaati,  duuranti katthehi tu sabbaava savisaye siyu.m baadhakaabhaavaa duuro gaamo,  antiko gaamotvevamaadi.
text.1306: [03] keci ^a^M0.0078^ea^ panaahu `asattavacanahetehi paa.tipadikatthe  dutiyaatatiyaapa~ncamiisattamiyo, sattavacanehi tu sabbaava savisaye'ti,  te pana~n~neheva pa.tikkhittaa. duura.m maggo, antika.m maggoti  kiriyaavisesana.m... bhuudhaatussa gammamaanattaa. visuddho lobhaniiyehi  dhammehi, parimutto so dukkhasmaa vivicceva kaamehi, gambhiirato ca  puthulato ca yojana.m, aayaamena yojana.m, tato pabhuti, yato saraami  attaananti savisayeva vibhattiyo.
text.1308: [03] vajjane vattamaanehi apapariihi yoge pa~ncamii hoti. apa  saalaaya aayanti vaa.nijaa, pari saalaaya aayanti vaa.nijaa, saala.m  vajjetvaati attho. vajjaneti ki.m? rukkha.m parivijjotate vijju.  aapaa.taliputtasmaa vassi devoti mariyaadaa-bhividhiisvavadhi visayeva  pa~ncamii, vinaa paa.taliputtena saha veti viseso, eva.m yaava  paa.taliputtasmaa vassi devoti.
text.1310: [03] pa.tinidhimhi pa.tidaane ca vattamaanena patinaa yoge naamasmaa  pa~ncamii vibhatti hoti. buddhasmaa pati saariputto, ghatamassa tesasmaa  pati dadaati, pa.tinidhipa.tidaanesuuti ki.m? rukkha.m pati vijjotate.
text.1312: [03] ritesaddena ^a^M0.0079^ea^ yoge naamasmaa dutiyaa hoti pa~ncamii  ca. rite saddhamma.m, rite saddhammaa.
text.1314: [03] vinaa-~n~natrasaddehi yoge naamasmaa tatiyaa ca hoti dutiyaa  pa~ncamiyo ca. vinaa vaatena, vinaa vaata.m, vinaa vaatasmaa, a~n~natra  ekena pi.n.dapaataniihaarakena, a~n~natra dhamma.m, a~n~natra dhammaa.
text.1316: [03] etehi yoge tatiyaa hoti pa~ncamii ca. puthageva janena,  puthageva janasmaa, janena naanaa, janasmaa naanaa.
text.1318: [03] kiriyaadhaara bhuuta kattu kammaana.m dhaara.nena yo kiriyaayaadhaaro  tasmi.m kaarake naamasmaa sattamii hoti. ka.te nisiidati (devadatto),  thaaliya.m odana.m pacati, aakaase sakunaa, bhilesu tela.m, ga"ngaaya.m vajo.
text.1320: [03] nimittatthe sattamii hoti. ajinamhi ha~n~nate diipi, musaavaade  paacitthiya.m.
text.1323: [03] yassa ^a^M0.0080^ea^ bhaavo bhaavantarassa lakkha.na.m bhavati, tato  sattamii hoti. gaaviisu duyhamaanaasu gato, duddhaasu aagato.  bhaavoti ki.m? yo ja.taahi so bhu~njati. bhaavalakkha.nanti ki.m?  yo bhu~njati so devadatto, ``akaale vassati tassa, taale tassa na  vassatii''ti visayasattamii.
text.1325: [03] yassa bhaavo bhaavantarassa lakkha.na.m bhavati, tato cha.t.thii bhavati  sattamii ca anaadare gamyamaane. ``aako.tayanto so neti,  siviraajassa pekkhato'', ``maccu gacchati aadaaya, pekkhamaane  mahaajane''.
text.1326: [03] gunna.m saamiiti sambandhe cha.t.thii, gosu saamiiti visayasattamii,  eva.m gunnamissaro, gosvissaro, gunna.m adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunna.m  daayaado, gosu daahaado, dunna.m sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gunna.m patibhuu,  gosu patibhuu, gunna.m pasuuto, gosu pasuuto, kusalaa naccagiitassa, kusalaa  naccagiite, aayutto ka.takara.nassa, aayutto ka.takara.neti.
text.1327: [03] tathaadhaaravacanicchaaya.m sattamii, bhikkhuusu abhivaadenti, muddhani  dhumbitvaa, baahaasu gahetvaa, hatthesu pi.n.daaya caranti, pathesu gacchanti,  kadaliisu gaje rakkhantiiti. ~naa.nasmi.m pasannoti visayasattamii,  ~naa.nena pasannoti kara.ne tatiyaa, eva.m ~naa.nasmi.m ussukko ~naa.nena  ussukkoti.
text.1329: [03] jaatigu.nakiriyaahi ^a^M0.0081^ea^ samudaayatekadesassa puthakkara.na.m  niddhaara.na.m. yato ta.m kariiyati, tato cha.t.thiisattamiyo honti.  saalayo suukadha~n~naana.m pathyatamaa, saalayo suukadha~n~nesu pathyatamaa, ka.nhaa  gaaviina.m sampannakhiiratamaa, ka.nhaa gaaviisu sampannakhiiratamaa, gacchata.m  dhaavanto siighatamo, gacchantesu dhaavanto siighatamo. siilameva sutaa  seyyoti avadhimhiyeva pa~ncamii.
text.1331: [03] naamassaabhidheyyamatte pa.thamaavibhatti hoti. rukkho. itthi  pumaa napu.msakanti li"ngampi saddatthova, tathaa do.no khaarii aa.lhakanti  parimaa.nampi saddatthova, eko dve bahavoti sa"nkhyaapi saddatthova.
text.1333: [03] sato saddenaabhimukhiikara.namaamanta.na.m. tasmi.m visaye pa.thamaa  vibhatti hoti. bhopurisa, bhokkatthi, bho napu.msaka.
text.1335: [03] kiriyaakaarakasa~njaato assedambhaavahetuko sambandho naama.  tasmi.m cha.t.thii vibhatti hoti. ra~n~no puriso, sarati rajjassaati  sambandhe cha.t.thii, rajjasambandhini.m sati.m karotiiti attho,  kammavacanicchaarantu dutiyaava sarati rajja.m. tathaa rajakassa vattha.m  ^a^M0.0082^ea^ dadaati, paharato pi.t.thi.m dadaati, baalo puurati paapassa,  amacce taata jaanaahi, dhiire atthassa kovide, divasassa tikkhattu.m,  saki.m pakkhassa, puura.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa kumbhantvevamaadi.
text.1336: [03] kitakappayoge kaktukammesu bahula.m sambandhavacanicchaaya.m cha.t.thii,  saadhu sammato bahujanassa, suppa.tividdhaa buddhaana.m dhammadhaatu, dhammassa  gutto medhaavii, amata.m tesa.m paribhutta.m, tassa bhavanti vattaaro,  avisa.mvaadako lokassa, alajjiina.m nissaaya, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m  upaadaaya pasaadotvevamaadi.
text.1337: [03] kattukammavacanicchaayantu tatiyaa dutiyaayo ca, sa~ncatto pitaraa  aha.m, sarasi tva.m evaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa, bhagavanta.m dassanaayatvevamaadi.
text.1339: [03] tulyatthena yoge cha.t.thii hoti tatiyaa vaa, tulyo pitu, tulyo  pitaraa, sadiso pitu, sadiso pitaraa, iha katha.m tatiyaa na hoti?  ajjunassa tulaa natthi, kesavassupamaa na ceti, nete tulyatthaa,  ki~njarahi tulyaanamopammatthaa.
text.1341: [03] akaaranthato naamasmaa yona.m .taa.te honti yathaakkama.m, .takaaraa  sabbadesatthaa, buddhaa buddhe, atoti ki.m? ka~n~naayo, itthiyo, vadhuyo,  idha kasmaa na bhavati aggayo. avidhaanasaamatthiyaa.
text.1343: [03] akaarantato ^a^M0.0083^ea^ naamasmaa nina.m .taa.te vaa honti  yathaakkama.m. ruupaa, ruupe, ruupaani, atotveva a.t.thiini.
text.1345: [03] akaarantato naamasmaa smaasminna.m .taa.te vaa honti yathaakkama.m.  buddhaa buddhasmaa, buddhe buddhasmi.m, atotveva aggismaa aggismi.m.
text.1347: [03] akaarantato parassa sassa catutthiyaa aayo hoti vaa.  buddhaaya buddhassa, bhiyyo taadatthyeyevaayamaayo dissate, kvacideva~n~nattha,  atotveva isissa, catutthiyaati ki.m? buddhassa mukha.m, attatthanti  atthasaddena samaaso.
text.1348: [03] sabbaaditopi smaasmi.msaana.m .taa.teaayaa honteva...  niruttikaaraanumatattaa buddhavacane sandassanavato ca, tatrodamudaahara.na.m  `asmaa lokaa paramhaa ca, ubhayaa dha.msate naro', `tyaaha.m mante  paratthaddho', `yaayeva kho panatthaaya aagaccheyyaatho tamevattha.m saadhuka.m  manasikareyyaatho'ti.
text.1350: [03] ghapato naadiinamekasmi.m yayaa honi yathaakkama.m. ka~n~naaya,  rattiyaa, itthiyaa, dhenuyaa, vadhuyaa, ekasminti ki.m? ka~n~naahi,  rattiihi.
text.1352: [03] ghapasa~n~nehi ^a^M0.0084^ea^ tetimaamuuhi naadiinamekasmi.mssaa vaa  hoti, tassaa kata.m, tassaa diiyate, tassaa nissa.ta.m, tassaa pariggaho,  tassaa pati.t.thita.m, taaya vaa, eva.m etissaa etaaya, imissaa imaaya,  amussaa amuyaa, etehiiti ki.m? sabbaaya, naadiina.m tveva? saa,  ghapatotveva? taahi amuuhi.
text.1354: [03] dvaadiina.m sattarasanna.m sa"nkhyaana.m nuk hoti na.mmhi vibhattamhi,  dvinna.m catunna.m, pa~ncanna.m, eva.m yaava a.t.thaarasanna.m, ukaaro uccaara.nattho,  kakaaro antaavayavattho, tena na.mmhi na diigho.
text.1356: [03] na.mmhi bahuno katissa ca nuk hoti, bahunna.m, katinna.m.
text.1358: [03] jhasa~n~naa tito na.mvacanassa .n.na.m.n.nanna.m hoti, ti.n.na.m, ti.n.nanna.m,  jhaati ki.m tissanna.m.
text.1362: [03] naamasmaa sassa su~n hoti, buddhassa, dvisakaarapaa.thena siddhe  laaghavatthamida.m.
text.1364: [03] ssamaadiisvitaraadiinami ^a^M0.0085^ea^ hoti, itarissa.m,  itarissaa, ekissa.m, ekissaa, a~n~nissa.m, a~n~nissaa, etissa.m,  etissaa, etissaaya, imissa.m, imissaa, imissaaya, esviti ki.m?  itaraaya, esanti ki.m? sabbassa.m, sabbassaa.
text.1366: [03] ssamaadiisu tassaa vaa i hoti, tissa.m tassa.m, tissaa tassaa,  tissaaya tassaaya, ssa.mssaassaayesvitveva? taaya.
text.1368: [03] taaetaaimaato sassa ssaayo hoti vaa. tassaaya taaya,  etissaaya etaaya, imissaaya imaaya.
text.1370: [03] ratyaadiihi smino .to hoti vaa, ratto rattiya.m, aado  aadismi.m.
text.1374: [03] ltuppaccayantaana.m pitaadiina.m ca aa hoti simhi. kattaa, pitaa.  pitu, maatu, bhaavu, miitu, duhitu, jaamaatu, nattu, hotu, potu.
text.1376: [03] ltupitaadiina.m ^a^M0.0086^ea^ a hoti ge aa ca, bho katta, bho  kattaa, bho pita, bho pitaa.
text.1378: [03] a i u iccesa.m vaa diigho hoti ge pare tili"nge. bho  purisaa, bho purisa, bho aggii, bho aggi, bho bhikkhuu, bho bhikkhuu.
text.1380: [03] ghato brahmaadito ca gasse vaa hoti. bhoti ka~n~ne, bhoti  ka~n~naa, bho brahme, bho brahma, bho khatte, bho khatta, bho ise, bho isi,  bho sakhe, bho sakha. sakhi sakhiiti itthiya.m siddhameva.  aakatiga.no-ya.m, evama~n~natraapi.
text.1382: [03] ammaadiihi gasse na hoti. bhoti ammaa, bhoti annaa,  bhoti ambaa.
text.1384: [03] ammaadiina.m ge rasso hoti vaa. bhoti amma, bhoti ammaa.
text.1386: [03] ssamaadiisu gho rasso hoti. tassa.m, tassaa, tassaaya, ta.m,  sabhati.m, esviti ki.m? taaya, sabhaaya.
text.1388: [03] ekavacane ^a^M0.0087^ea^ yosu ca ghaokaarantavajjitaa na.m naamaana.m  rasso hoti tili"nge. itthi.m, itthiyaa, itthiyo, vadhu.m vadhuyaa,  vadhuyo, da.n.di.m, da.n.dinaa, da.n.dino, sayambhu.m, sayambhunaa, sayambhuvo,  agho nanti ki.m? ka~n~naaya, ka~n~naayo, oggaha.namuttarattha.m.
text.1390: [03] aghona.m ge vaa rasso hoti tili"nge, itthi, itthii, vadhu, vadhuu,  da.n.di, da.n.dii, sayambhu, sayambhuu. aghona.mtveva? bhoti ka~n~naa, bho  go.
text.1392: [03] napu.msakavajjitassa naamassa sismi.m rasso na hoti. itthii,  da.n.dii, vadhuu, sayambhuu. sisminti ki.m? itthi.m, anapu.msakassaati  ki.m? da.n.di kula.m.
text.1394: [03] gasihina.mvajjitaasu vibhattiisu gosaddassa gaavagavaa honti.  (gaava.m, gava.m), gaavo, gavo, gaavena, gavena, gaavassa, gavassa,  gaavasmaa, gavasmaa, gaave, gave. agasihina.msuuti ki.m? bho go, go  ti.t.thati, gohi, gona.m.
text.1396: [03] gossa sumhi gaavagavaa honti vaa. gaavesu, gavesu, gosu.
text.1398: [03] gossa ^a^M0.0088^ea^ se vaa gava.m hoti saha sena. gava.m,  gaavassa, gavassa.
text.1400: [03] na.mvacanena saha gossa gunna.m hoti gava.mca vaa. gunna.m, gava.m, gona.m.
text.1402: [03] goto naassa aa hoti vaa. gaavaa, gavaa, gaavena, gavena.
text.1404: [03] a.mvacane gossa gaavha vaa hoti. vaavha.m, gaava.m, gava.m. gossa  go.naadeso na kato... saddantarattaa.
text.1406: [03] pasa~n~niito a.mvacanassa ya.m vaa hoti. itthiya.m, itthi.m.  piitoti ki.m? da.n.di.m, ratti.m.
text.1408: [03] jhasa~n~niito a.mvacanassa na.m vaa hoti. da.n.dina.m, da.n.di.m. katha.m  `buddha.m aadiccabandhuna'nti? yogavibhaavaa. jhaati ki.m? itthi.m.  iiti ki.m? aggi.m.
text.1410: [03] jhiito ^a^M0.0089^ea^ yona.m none vaa honti yathaakkama.m pulli"nge.  da.n.diino, da.n.dine, da.n.dii, jhiito tveva? itthiyo, pumeti ki.m?  da.n.diini kulaani.
text.1412: [03] jhiito yona.m no vaa hoti pulli"nge. da.n.dino ti.t.thanti,  da.n.dino passa, da.n.dii vaa.
text.1414: [03] jhiito smi.mvacanassa ni hoti vaa, da.n.dini, da.n.dismi.m, jhiito  tveva? aggismi.m.
text.1416: [03] ambuaadiihi sminoni hoti vaa, phala.m patati ambuni, puppha.m  yathaa pa.msuni aatape kata.m, vaatveva? ambumhi, pa.msumhi.
text.1418: [03] kammaadito smino ni hoti vaa. kammani kamme. kamma,  camma, vesma, bhasma (asma), brahma, atta, aatuma, ghamma, muddha.  kammaaditoti ki.m? buddhe.
text.1420: [03] kammaadito naavacanassa eno vaa hoti. kammena, kammanaa,  cammena, cammanaa, kammaaditotveva? buddhena.
text.1422: [03] jhalato ^a^M0.0090^ea^ sassa no vaa hoti. aggino aggissa,  da.n.dino da.n.dissa, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, sayambhuno sayambhussa,
text.1423: [03] katha.m `yo ca sisso mahaamune' ti? (3) ``ito kvaci  sassa .taanubandho''ti brahmaadiisu paa.thaa sassa e .taanubandho.
text.1425: [03] jhalato smaassa naa hoti vaa. agginaa aggismaa, da.n.dinaa  da.n.dismaa, bhikkhunaa bhikkhusmaa, sayambhunaa sayambhusmaa.
text.1427: [03] lato yona.m vo hoti vaa pulli"nge. bhikkhavo bhikkhuu,  sayambhuvo sayambhuupumeti ki.m? aayuuni.
text.1429: [03] jantvaadito yona.m no hoti vo ca vaa pulli"nge. jantuno,  jantavo jantuyo, gotrabhuno, gotrabhuvo gotrabhuu. sahabhuno, sahabhuvo  sahabhuu.
text.1431: [03] kuupaccayantato yona.m no vaa hoti pulli"nge, viduno viduu,  vi~n~nuno vi~n~nuu, sabba~n~nuno sabba~n~nuu.
text.1433: [03] amusaddato yona.m lopova hoti pulli"nge, amuu, pumetveva?  amuyo amuuni. vopavaadoya.m.
text.1435: [03] amusmaa ^a^M0.0091^ea^ sassa no na hoti, amussa, noti ki.m?  amuyaa.
text.1437: [03] yona.m lope nisu ca diigho hoti, a.t.thii a.t.thiini,  yolopanisuuti ki.m? rattiyo.
text.1439: [03] esu naamassa diigho hoti. aggiisu, aggiina.m, aggiihi.
text.1441: [03] pa~ncaadiina.m cuddasanna.m suna.mhisva hoti. pa~ncasu, pa~ncanna.m,  pa~ncahi, chasu, channa.m, chahi, eva.m yaava a.t.tharasaa.
text.1443: [03] yvaadiisu ntussa a hoti. gu.navantaa, gu.navanta.m, gu.navante,  gu.navantena iccaadi, yvaa-doti ki.m? gu.navaa ti.t.thati.
text.1445: [03] a.msesu ntappaccayassa .ta hoti vaa ntussa ca. ya.m ya.m hi raaja  bhajati santa.mvaayadi vaa asa.m, kiccaa-nakubbassa kareyya kicca.m,  himava.mva pabbata.m, sujaatimantopi ajaatimassa. yogavibhaagenaa~n~natraapi.  cakkhumaa andhitaa honti, vaggumudaatiiriyaa pana bhikkhuu va.n.navaa  honti.
text.1447: [03] jhasa~n~nassa ^a^M0.0092^ea^ issa yosu vaa .ta hoti pulli"nge.  aggayo aggii, jhaggaha.na.m ki.m? ikaarantasamudaayassa .ta maa siyaabhi,  rattiyo, iggaha.na.m ki.m? da.n.dino, pumeti ki.m? a.t.thiini.
text.1449: [03] lasa~n~nassa ussa vevosu .ta hoti. bhikkhave, bhikkhavo,  vevosuuti ki.m? jantuyo, uggaha.na.m ki.m? sayambhuvo.
text.1451: [03] yomhi kvaci lasa~n~nassa ussa vaa .ta hoti. hetayo,  nandanti ta.m kurayo dassanena, ajjeva ta.m kurayo paapayatu. vaati ki.m?  hetuyo.
text.1453: [03] lasa~n~nato uto yossaalapane vevo honti vaa pulli"nge.  bhikkhave, bhikkhavo bhikkhuu, pumeti ki.m aayuuni, aalapaneti ki.m?  jantuyo ti.t.thanti, lutotveva? dhenuyo, sayambhuvo.
text.1455: [03] naamasmaa paresa.m smaahisminna.m mhaa bhimhi vaa honti yathaakkama.m.  buddhamhaa buddhasmaa, buddhebhi buddhehi, buddhamhi buddhasmi.m,  bahulaadhikaaraaapavaadavisayepi, dasasahassimhi dhaatuyaa.
text.1459: [03] akaarantaana.m sabbaadiina.m e hoti na.mmhi suhisu ca. sabbesa.m,  sabbesu, sabbehi, sabbaadiinanti ki.m? buddhaana.m, assetveva? amuusa.m.  sabba katara katama ubhaya itara a~n~na a~n~natara a~n~natama (4)  ``pubbaparaa-varadakkhi.nuttaraa-dharaani vavatthaayamasa~n~naaya.m''  (paa,1,1,34) ya tya ta eta ima amu ki.m eka tumha amha.
text.1461: [03] sabbaadito na.mvacanassa sa.msaana.m honti. sabbesa.m, sabbesaana.m.
text.1463: [03] sabbaadiina.m ghapato sassa ssaa vaa hoti, sabbassaa sabbaaya,  paggaha.namuttarattha.m.
text.1465: [03] sabbaadiina.m ghapato smino ssa.m vaa hoti, sabbassa.m sabbaaya,  amussa.m amuyaa.
text.1467: [03] ghapato smino ya.m vaa hoti, ka~n~naaya.m ka~n~naaya, rattiya.m  rattiyaa, vadhuya.m vadhuyaa, sabbaaya.m sabbaaya, amuya.m amuyaa.
text.1469: [03] sabhaaparisaahi ^a^M0.0094^ea^ smino ti.m vaa hoti, sabhati.m  sabhaaya, parisati.m parisaaya.
text.1471: [03] ehi smino si hoti vaa, padasi padasmi.m, bilasi bilasmi.m.
text.1473: [03] padaadiihi naassa saa hoti vaa, padasaa padena, bilasaa bilena.
text.1475: [03] ehi naassa saa hoti vaa, kodhasaa kodhena, atthasaa atthena.
text.1477: [03] akaarantato parassa naavacanassa enaadeso hoti, buddhena,  atoti ki.m? agginaa.
text.1479: [03] akaarantato naamasmaa sissa o hoti, buddho, atotveva?  aggi.
text.1481: [03] akaarantato naamasmaa sissa e hoti vaa kvaci, vanappagumbe  yathaa phussitagge. apavaadavisayepi bahula.mviidhaanaa-sukhe dukkhe  ^a^M0.0095^ea^. vaati ki.m? vanappagumbo kvaciiti ki.m? pakkhe  sabbattha maa hotu.
text.1483: [03] akaarantato naamasmaa sissa a.m hoti napu.msakali"nge. ruupa.m.
text.1485: [03] akaarantato naamasmaa yona.m ni hoti napu.msake. sabbaani  ruupaani, niccavidhaane phala.m ekaccaadisabbaadiina.m pa.thamaaya.m.
text.1487: [03] jhalato yona.m ni hoti vaa napu.msake, a.t.thiini a.t.thii, aayuuni  aayuu.
text.1489: [03] jhalato yona.m lopo hoti, a.t.thii, aayuu, aggii, bhikkhuu,  jhalaatveva? aggayo. pageva kasmaa na hoti? antara"ngattaa  akaarassa.
text.1491: [03] jantuhetuuhi iikaarantehi ghapa sa~n~nehi ca paresa.m yona.m vaa lopo  hoti, jantuu jantuyo, hetuu hetuyo, da.n.dii da.n.diyo, ka~n~naa ka~n~naayo,  rattii rattiyo, itthii itthiyo, dhenuu dhenuyo, vadhuu vadhuyo.
text.1493: [03] pasa~n~nassa ^a^M0.0096^ea^ iva.n.nassa lopo hoti vaa yakaare,  ratyo ratyaa, ratya.m, pokkhara~n~no, pokkhara~n~naa, pokkhara~n~na.m, vaa tveva?  rattiyo, passaati ki.m? da.n.diyo, iva.n.nassaati ki.m? dhenuyo  vadhuyo. katha.m `anu~n~naato aha.m matyaa'ti? `ye passaa'ti  yogavibhaagaa.
text.1495: [03] naamasmaa gasiina.m lopo hoti vijjhantaraabhaave, bho purisa,  aya.m, da.n.dii.
text.1497: [03] avijjamaanasa"nkhyehi paraasa.m sabbaasa.m vibhattiina.m lopo hoti,  ca vaa eva eva.m, etasmaayeva li"ngaa asa"nkhyehi syaadyuppatti  anumiiyate.
text.1499: [03] ekatthiibhaave sabbaasa.m vibhattiina.m lopo hoti bahula.m, puttiiyati,  raajapuriso, vaasi.t.tho, kvaci na hoti bahula.m vidhaanaa-parantapo,  bhagandaro, parassapada.m, attanopada.m, gavampati, devaana.mpiyatisso,  antevaasii, janesuto mamatta.m maamako.
text.1501: [03] amaadekatthaa pubba.m yadekattha.m tato paraasa.m sabbaasa.m vibhattiina.m  lopo hoti. adhitthi. idha na hoti bahula.m
text.1502: [03] vidhaanaa ^a^M0.0097^ea^ yathaapatthiiyaa, yathaaparisaaya, pubbasmaati  ki.m? gaamagato.
text.1504: [03] amaadekatthaa pubba.m yadekatthamakaaranta.m, tato paraasa.m sabbaasa.m  vibhattiina.m lopo na hoti, antu, bhavatyapa~ncamyaa, upakumbha.m,  apa~ncamiyaati ki.m? upakumbhaa aanaya.
text.1506: [03] amaadekatthaa pubba.m yadekatthamakaaranta.m, tato paraasa.m  tatiyaasatthamiina.m vaa a.m hoti, upakumbhena kata.m, upakumbha.m kata.m,  upakumte nidhehi, upakumbha.m nidhehi.
text.1508: [03] naamhi raajassi vaa hoti, sabbadattena raajinaa, vaatveva?  ra~n~naa.
text.1510: [03] raajassa uu hoti vaa suna.mhisu, raajuusu raajesu, raajuuna.m ra~n~na.m,  raajuuhi raajehi.
text.1512: [03] imasaddassaanitthiya.m .te hoti vaa suna.mhisu, esu imesu, esa.m  imesa.m, esi imehi, anitthiyanti ki.m? imaasu, imaasa.m, imaahi.
text.1514: [03] imasaddassaanitthiya.m ^a^M0.0098^ea^ naamhi anaimiiccaadesaa  honti, anena imiinaa, anitthiya.mtveva? imaaya.
text.1516: [03] imasaddassaanapu.msakassa aya.m hoti simhi, aya.m puriso, aya.m  itthii, anapu.msakassaati ki.m? ima.m.
text.1518: [03] tyatetaanamanapu.msakaana.m tassa so hoti simhi, syo puriso,  syaa itthii, eva.m so, saa, eso, esaa, anapu.msakassetveva? tya.m, ta.m,  eta.m.
text.1520: [03] anapu.msakassaamussa makaarassa ^b^so^eb^ hoti simhi, asu  puriso, asu itthii.
text.1522: [03] amussa massa ke vaa so hoti, asuko amuko, asukaa  amukaa, asuka.m amuka.m, asukaani amukaani.
text.1524: [03] tasaddassa tassa no vaa hoti sabbaasu vibhattiisu, ne te naayo  taayo, na.m ta.m, naani taani iccaadi.
text.1526: [03] saadiisvimassa ^a^M0.0099^ea^ tatassa ca .to vaa hoti, assa  imassa, asmaa imasmaa, asmi.m imasmi.m, assaaya imissaaya, assa.m  imissa.m, assaa imissaa, aasa.m imaasa.m, amhaa imamhaa, amhi  imamhi, assa tassa, asmaa tasmaa, asmi.m tasmi.m, assaaya tassaaya,  assa.m tassa.m, assaa tassaa, aasa.m taasa.m, amhaa tamhaa, amhi tamhi,  ssaayaadiggaha.namaadesantare maa hotuuti.
text.1528: [03] isismaa sissa .te vaa hoti, `yo nvajja vinaye ka"nkha.m,  atthadhammaviduu ise', vaatveva? isi.
text.1530: [03] isismaa parassa dutiyaayossa .te vaa hoti, `sama.ne braahma.ne  vande, sampannacara.ne ise', vaatveva? isayo passa, dutiyassaati ki.m?  isayo ti.t.thanti.
text.1532: [03] akaarantehi ekaccaadiihi yona.m .te hoti, ekacce ti.t.thanti,  ekace passa, atoti ki.m? ekaccaayo, eva.m esa sa pa.thama.
text.1534: [03] ekaccaadiihi parassa nissa .taa na hoti, ekaccaani.
text.1536: [03] sabbaadiihi parassa nissa .taa na hoti, sabbaani.
text.1538: [03] akaarantehi sabbaadiihi yoname.ta hoti, sabbe ti.t.thanti, sabbe  passa, atotveva? sabbaayo.
text.1540: [03] naamabhuutehii appadhaanehi ca sabbaadiihi ya.m vutta.m, ya~ncaa~n~na.m  sabbaadikaariya.m, ta.m na hoti, te sabbaa, te piyasabbaa, te atisabbaa.
text.1542: [03] tatiyatthena yoge sabbaadiihi ya.m vutta.m, ya~ncaa~n~na.m sabbaadi  kaariya.m, ta.m na hoti, maasena pubbaana.m maasapubbaana.m.
text.1544: [03] catthasamaasavisaye sabbaadiihi ya.m vutta.m, ya~ncaa~n~na.m  sabbaadikaariya.m, ta.m na hoti, ikkhi.nuttarapubbaana.m, samaaseti ki.m?  amusa~nca tesa~nca dehi.
text.1546: [03] etthasamaasavisadhaya sabbaadiihi yadhassa.ta vutto, tassa vaa  hoti, pugguttare, pubbuttaraa.
text.1548: [03] etehi ^a^M0.0101^ea^ pubbaadiihi chahi savisaye e.ta vaa hoti,  pubbe pubbaa, pare paraa, apare aparaa, dakkhi.ne dakkhi.naa, uttare  uttaraa, adhare adharaa, chahitiki.m? ye.
text.1550: [03] manaadiihi smimaadiina.m sisoosaasaa vaa honti yathaakkama.m,  manasi manasmi.m, manaso manassa, mano mana.m, manasaa manena, manasaa  manasmaa, katha.m `putto jaato acetaso, hitvaa yaati sumedhaso,  suddhuttaravaasasaa, hemakappanavaasase'ti? sakatthe.natthaa. manatama tapa  teja sira ura vaca oja rajayasa paya (6) ``saravayaa-yavaasacetaa  jalaasayaakkhayalohapa.tamanesu''.
text.1554: [03] bhavantasaddassa bhontaadeso vaa hoti gayonaase, bhonta bhava.m,  bhonto bhavanto, bhotaa bhavataa, bhoto bhavato, bho iti aamanta.ne  nipaato `kuto nu aagacchatha bho tayo janaa', eva.m bhavantati, bhaddeti  saddantharena siddha.m, saddhanthaiti dassa dvibhaavena.
text.1556: [03] aggismaa sissa ni yoti vaa, aggini aggi.
text.1558: [03] simhi ^a^M0.0102^ea^ ntappaccayassa a.m hoti vaa, gaccha.m gacchanto.
text.1560: [03] bhuudhaatuto ntassa a.m hoti simhi nicca.m punabbidhaanaa, bhava.m.
text.1562: [03] simhi mahantaarahantaana.m ntassa .taa vaa hoti, mahaa maha.m, arahaa  araha.m.
text.1566: [03] ntussa a.m"na.m honti simhi napu.msake, gu.nava.m kula.m, gu.navanta.m  kula.m, napu.msaketi.m ki.m? siilavaa bhikkhu.
text.1568: [03] himavato simhii ntussa o vaa hoti, himavanto himavaa.
text.1570: [03] raajaadiihiyuvaadiihi ca sissa aa hoti, raajaa, yuvaa. raaja  brahma sakha atta aatuma (7) ``dhammo vaa~n~natthe'' da.lhadhammaa, asma,  (8) ``imo bhaave'' a.nimaa, (mahimaa, garimaa) laghimaa, yuva saa  suvaa maghava puma vattaha.
text.1573: [03] raajaadiina.m ^a^M0.0103^ea^ yuvaadiina.m ca aana"na hoti vaa a.mmhi,  raajaana.m raaja.m, yuvaana.m yuva.m.
text.1575: [03] raajaadiihi yuvaadiihi ca yona.m aano vaa hoti, raajaano  yuvaano, vaa tveva? raajaa raaje, yuvaa yuve.
text.1577: [03] sakhato yona maayo no honti vaa aano ca, sakhaayo,  sakhino, sakhaano, vaa tveva? sakhaa, sakhe.
text.1581: [03] sakhassa i hoti nonaasesu, sakhino, sakhinaa, sakhissa.
text.1583: [03] sakhassa i vaa hoti smaana.msu, sakhismaa sakhasmaa, sakhiina.m  sakhaana.m.
text.1585: [03] sakhassa aara"na vaa hoti yosva.mhisu smaana.msu ca, sakhaaro  sakhaayo, sakhaaresu sakhesu, sakhaara.m sakha.m, sakhaarehi sakhehi,  sakhaaraa sakhaa, sakhasmaa, sakhaaraana.m sakhaana.m.
text.1587: [03] ltuppaccayantaana.m ^a^M0.0104^ea^ pitaadiina.m ca aara"na hotii  sato-~n~natra, kattaaro, pitaro, kattaara.m, pitara.m, kattaaraa, pitaraa,  kattari, pitari, aseti ki.m? kattuno, pituno.
text.1589: [03] namhi ltupitaadiinumaana"na vaa hoti, kattaaraana.m kattuuna.m, ditaraana.m  pitunna.m.
text.1591: [03] namhi ltupitaadiinamaa vaa hotii, kattaana.m kattuuna.m, piitaana.m pitunna.m.
text.1593: [03] ltupitaadihi sassa lopo vaa hoti, katthu katthuno,  sakamantaatu sakamandhaatuno, piitu pituno.
text.1595: [03] suhisu ltupitaadiinamaara"na vaa hoti, kattaaresu kattuusu, pitaresu  pituusu, kattaarehi kattuuhi, pitarehi piituuhii.
text.1597: [03] yosu nadisaddassa aama vaa hoti, najjaayo nadiyo.
text.1599: [03] katimhaa dhayaana.m .ti hoti, kati ti.t.thanti, kati passa.
text.1601: [03] pa~ncaadiihi ^a^M0.0105^ea^ cuddasahi sa.mkhyaahi yona.m .to hoti  pa~nca, pa~nca, eva.m yaava a.t.thaarasaa. pa~ncaadiihiiti ki.m? dve, tayo,  cattaaro, cuddhasahiiti ki.m? dve visatiyo.
text.1603: [03] ubhagohi yona.m .to hoti, ubho, ubho, gaavo, gaavo, katha.m  `imekaratthi.m ubhayo vasaamaa'ti? .tomhi yakaaraagamo.
text.1605: [03] aaravaadesato yona.m .to hoti, sakhaaro, kattaaro, pitaro.
text.1607: [03] aaravaadesamhaa yona.m .to.te vaa honti yathaakkama.m, sakhaaro,  sakhaare sakhaayo, .toggaha.na.m laaghavattha.m.
text.1609: [03] aaravaadesamhaa naasmaana.m .taa hoti, kattaaraa, kattaraa. kuuci vaa  hoti bayulaadhikaaraa, etaadisaa sakhaaramhaa.
text.1613: [03] divaadiihi ^a^M0.0106^ea^ naamehi smino .ti hoti, divi, bhuvi.  nicca.m vakaaraagamo.
text.1615: [03] smimhi aaro rasso hoti, kattari, nattari.
text.1617: [03] natvaadivajjitaana.m pitaadiinamaaro rasso hoti sabbaasu  vibhattiisu, pitaro, pitara.m, anutvaadiinanti ki.m? nattaaro.
text.1619: [03] suhisu yuvaadiina.m aana"na hoti, yuvaanesu, yuvaanehi.
text.1621: [03] esu yuvaadiinamaa hoti, yuvaano, yuvaanaa, yuvaane.
text.1623: [03] yuvaadiihi smaasminna.m naane honti yathaakkama.m, yuvaanaa, yuvaane.
text.1625: [03] yuvaadiihi yona.m none vaa honti yathaakkama.m, yuvaano, yuvaane,  vaati ki.m? yuve passa, noggaha.na.m laaghavattha.m.
text.1627: [03] a~n~napadatthe ^a^M0.0107^ea^ vattamaanaa ikaarantato naamasmaa yona.m  none vaa honti yathaakkama.m pulli"nge, tomara"nkusapaa.nino,  tomara"nkusapaa.nine, vaatveva? tomara"nkusapaa.nayo, a~n~nattheti ki.m?  paa.nayo.
text.1629: [03] a~n~napadatthe vatthamaanaa ikaarantato naamasmaa smino ne hoti  vaa kvaci pulli"nge, kata~n~numhi ca posamhi, siilavante ariya vuttine,  vaatveva? ariyavuttimhi, pumetveva? ariyavuttiyaa.
text.1631: [03] pumasaddato smino ya.m vutta.m, ta.m vaa hoti, pumaane pume.
text.1633: [03] pumassa naamhi ya.m vutta.m, ta.m vaa hoti, pumaanaa pumena.
text.1635: [03] pumassa sumhi ya.m vutta.m, ta.m aa ca vaa hoti, pumaanesu, pumaasu  pumesu.m.
text.1637: [03] pumasaddato gassa a.m vaa hoti, bho puma.m bho puma, bho ittipuma.m  bho itthipuma.
text.1639: [03] saasaddassa ^a^M0.0108^ea^ aana"na hoti a.mse ge ca, saana.m,  saanassa, cabhaa saana.
text.1641: [03] vattahaa sana.mna.m nonaana.m honti yathaakkama.m, vattahaano, vattahaanaana.m.

text.1647: [03] pumaadinamu hoti vaa sasmaasu naamhi ca, pumuno pumassa,  pumunaa pumaanaa, pumunaa pumaanaa, kammuno kammassa, kammunaa kammasmaa,  kammunaa kammanaa, thaamuno thaamassa, thaamunaa thaamasmaa, thaamunaa  thaamena, addhuno addhassa, addhunaa addhasmaa, addhunaa addhanaa.
text.1649: [03] yuvaa sassa vaa ino hoti, yuvino yuvassa.
text.1651: [03] attaatumehi ^a^M0.0109^ea^ sassa no hoti vaa, attano attassa,  aatumano aatumassa.
text.1653: [03] attaaatumaana.m suhisu vaa naka hoti, attanesu attesu aatumanesu  aatumesu, attanehi attehi aatumanehi aatumehi, katha.m `verinesu'ti?  `naka' iti yogavibhaagaa.
text.1655: [03] brahmaa attaaatumehi ca svaassa naa hoti, brahmunaa, attanaa,  aatumanaa.
text.1657: [03] imaetasaddaana.m kathitaanukathanavisaye dutiyaayamenaadeso hoti,  ima.m bhikkhu.m vinayamajjhaapaya, atho ena.m dhammamajjhaapaya, ime bhikkhuu  vinayamajjhaapaya, atho ene dhammamajjhaapaya, evametassa ca yojaniya.m.
text.1659: [03] sabbaasu vibhattisu kissa ko hoti, ko, eka, kaa, kaayo,  ka.m, kaani, keneccaami.

text.1663: [03] a.msisu saha tehi ki.msaddassa ki.m hoti napu.msake. ki.m, ki.m,  napu.msaketi ki.m? ko, ka.m.
text.1665: [03] a.msisu saha teti imassa ida.m hoti vaa napu.msake, ida.m ima.m,  ida.m ima.m.
text.1667: [03] a.msisu saha tehi amussa adu.m hoti vaa napu.msake, adu.m amu.m,  adu.m amu.m.
text.1669: [03] amhassa asmaa hoti vaa sumhi, bhattirasmaasu yaa tava, vaa  tveva? amhesu.
text.1671: [03] na.mmhi ticatunna.m tissacatassaa honti itthiya.m yathaakkama.m,  tissanna.m catassanna.m, itthiyanti ki.m? ti.n.na.m catunna.m.
text.1673: [03] vibhattisahitaana.m ticatunna.m yomhi tisso catasso honti  itthiya.m yathaakkama.m, tisso catasso.

text.1677: [03] yomhi savibhattiina.m ticatunna.m tayocattaaro honti yathaakkama.m  pulli"nge, tayo, cattaaro.
text.1679: [03] catusaddassa savibhattissa yomhi caturo vaa hoti pulli"nge,  caturo janaa sa.mvidhaaya, katha.m `caturo nimitte naaddassaasi'nti?  li"ngavipallaasaa.

text.1683: [03] na.msesvamussa savibhattissa asmaaka.m mama.m honti vaa yathaakkama.m,  asmaaka.m, amhaaka.m, mama.m mama.

text.1689: [03] tumhassa ^a^M0.0112^ea^ tayaatayiina.m takaarassa tva hoti vaa, tvayaa  tayaa, tvayi tayi.
text.1691: [03] svaamhi tumhassa savibhattissa tvamhaa hoti vaa, pattaa nissa.m  saya.m tvamhaa, vaa tveva? tvayaa.
text.1693: [03] pa.thame yomhi ntantuuna.m savibhattiina.m ntoiccaadeso vaa hoti,  gacchanto, gacchantaa, gu.navanto gu.navantaa.

text.1697: [03] saadiisu ntantuuna.m savibhattiina.m totaatitaa honti vaa yathaakkama.m,  gacchato gacchantassa, gu.navato gu.navantassa, gacchataa gacchantamhaa,  gu.navataa gu.navanthamhaa, gacchati gacchante, gu.navati gu.navante, gacchataa  gacchantena, gu.navataa gu.navantena.
text.1699: [03] ge pare ntantuuna.m savibhattiina.m .ta.taaa.m iccaadesaa honti, bho  gaccha, bho gacchaa, bho gaccha.m, to gu.nava, bho gu.navaa, bho gu.nava.m.
text.1701: [03] yomhii ^a^M0.0113^ea^ dviissa savibhattissa duvedve honti pacceka.m,  duve, dve.

text.1704: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ naasmaasu ra~n~naa. naasmaasu raajassa  savibhattissa ra~n~naa hoti, ra~n~naa kata.m, ra~n~naa nissa.ta.m.

text.1710: [03] a.mmhi ^a^M0.0114^ea^ tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m ta.m ma.m tava.m mama.m  honti yathaakkama.m, ta.m, ma.m, tava.m, mama.m,
text.1712: [03] naasmaasu tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m tayaamayaa honti  yathaakkama.m, tayaa kata.m, mayaa kata.m, tayaa nissa.ta.m, mayaa nissa.ta.m.
text.1714: [03] se tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m tava mama tuyha.m mayha.m honti  yathaakkama.m, tava, tuyha.m, mama, mayha.m.
text.1716: [03] na.mmhi tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m "na.m"naaka.m honti pacceka.m, tumha.m,  tumhaaka.m, amha.m, amhaaka.m, yathaasa"nkhyamatra na vivacchate.
text.1718: [03] tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m pacceka.m "na.m"naaka.m vaa honti yomhi  dutiye, tumha.m, tumhaaka.m, tumhe, amha.m, amhaaka.m, amhe.
text.1720: [03] idamadhikata.m veditabba.m. pajjate-nenatthoti pada.m-syaadyanta.m  tyaadyanta.m ca, padasamuuho vaakya.m.
text.1722: [03] apa~ncamiyaa ^a^M0.0115^ea^ yona.mhisvapaadaado vattamaanaana.m padasmaa  paresa.m ekavaakye .thitaana.m tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m vono honti vaa  yathaakkama.m, ti.t.thatha vo, ti.t.thatha tumhe, ti.t.thaama no, ti.t.thaama maya.m, passati  vo, passati tumhe, passati no, passati amhe, diiyate vo, diiyate  tumha.m, diiyate no, diiyate amha.m, dhana.m vo, dhana.m tumha.m, dhana.m no dhana.m  amha.m, kata.m vo, kata.m tumhehi, kata.m no, kata.m amhehi, apa~ncamyaati  ki.m? nissa.ta.m tumhehi, nissa.ta.m amhehi, apaadaadotveva? `bala~nca  bhikkhuunamanuppadinna.m, tumhehi pu~n~na.m pasuta.m anappaka.m', padatotveva?  tumhe ti.t.thatha, ekavaakyetveva? devadatto ti.t.thati gaame, tumhe ti.t.thatha  nagare, savibhattiina.mtveva? arahati dhammo tumhaadisaana.m, arahati  dhammo amhaadisaana.m.
text.1724: [03] naamhi se ca apaadaado vattamaanaana.m padasmaa paresa.m ekavaakye  .thitaana.m tumhaamhasaddaana.m savibhattiina.m teme vaa honti yathaakkama.m, kata.m te,  kata.m tayaa, kata.m me, kata.m mayaa, diiyate te, diiyate tava diiyate me,  diiyate mama, dhana.m te, dhana.m tava, dhana.m me, dhana.m mama.
text.1726: [03] kathitaanukathanavisaye tumhaamha-saddaanamaadesaa nicca.m bhavanti  punabbidhaanaa, gaamo tumha.m pariggaho, atho janapado vo pariggaho.
text.1728: [03] vijjamaanapubbasmaa ^a^M0.0116^ea^ pa.thamantaa paresa.m  tumhaamhasaddaanamaadesaa vaa honti anvaadesepi, gaame pa.to tumhaaka.m,  atho nagare kambalo vo, atho nagare kambalo tumhaaka.m, sapubbaati ki.m?  pa.to tumhaaka.m, atho kambalo vo, pa.thamantaati ki? pa.to naagare  tumhaaka.m, atho kambalo gaame vo.
text.1730: [03] caadiihi yoge tumhaamhasaddaanamaadesaa na honti, gaamo tava ca  pariggaho, mama ca pariggaho, gaamo tava vaa pariggaho, mama vaa  pariggaho, gaamo tava ha pariggaho, mama ha pariggaho, gaamo tavaaha  pariggaho, mamaaha pariggaho, gaamo taveva pariggaho, mameva pariggaho,  eva.m sabbattha udaaharitabba.m, yogeti ki.m? gaamo ca te pariggaho,  nagara~nca me pariggaho.
text.1732: [03] dassanatthesu aalocanavajjitesu payujjamaanesu  tumhaamhasaddaanamaadesaa na honti, gaamo tumhe uddissaagato, gaamo  amhe uddissaagato, anaalocaneti ki.m? gaamo vo aaloceti, gaamo  no aaloceti.
text.1733: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ aamanta.na.m pubbamasanta.mva. aamanta.na.m  pubbamavijjamaana.m viya hoti tumhaamhasaddaanamaadesavisaye, devadatta tava  pariggaho, aamanta.nanti ki.m? kambalo te pariggaho, pubbamiti ki.m?  `mayeta.m sabbamakkhaata.m, tumhaaka.m dvijapu"ngavaa ^a^M0.0117^ea^, parassa hi  avijjamaanatte `apaadaado'ti pa.tisedho na siyaa. ivaati ki.m?  savana.m yathaa siyaa.
text.1735: [03] samaanaadhikara.ne parato saama~n~navacanamaamanta.namasanta.m viya na  hoti, maa.navaka ja.tilaka te pariggaho. parassaavijjamaanattepi  pubbaruupamupaadaayaadeso hoti, saama~n~navacananti ki.m? devadatta  maa.navaka tava pariggaho, ekattheti ki.m? devadatta ya~n~nadatta tumha.m  pariggaho.
text.1737: [03] bahuusu vattamaanamaamanta.na.m saama~n~navacanamekatthe avijjamaana.m viya  vaa na hoti, braahma.naa gu.navanto tumhaaka.m pariggaho, braahma.naa gu.navanto  vo pariggaho.
text.1742: [03] syaadyanta.m syaadyantena sahekattha.m hotiiti idamadhikata.m veditabba.m,  so ca bhinnatthaanamekatthiibhaavo samaasoti vuccate.
text.1743: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ asa"nkhya.mvibhatti sampatti samiipa  saakalyaabhaava yathaa pacchaayugapadatthe.
text.1744: [03] asa"nkhya.m ^a^M0.0118^ea^, syaadyanta.m vibhatyaadiinamatthe vattamaana.m  syaadyantena sahekattha.m bhavati, tattha vibhatyatthe taava itthiisu kathaa  pavattaa adhitthi. sampatti dvidhaa attasampatti samiddhi ca, sampanna.m  brahma.m sabrahma.m licchaviina.m, samiddhi bhikkhaana.m subhikkha.m. samiipe  kumbhassa samiipamupakumbha.m. saakalyesati.namajjhoharati, saagyadhiite.  abhaavo sambandhibhedaa bahuvidho, tatra iddhaabhaave-vigataa iddhi saddikaana.m  dussaddika.m, atthaabhaave-abhaavo makkhikaana.m nimmakkhika.m,  ahikkamaabhaave-atigataani ti.naani nitti.na.m, sampatyaabhaave-atigata.m  lahupaavura.na.m atilahupaavura.na.m, lahupaavura.nassa naayamupabhogakaaloti  attho. yathaa etthaa-nekavidho, tatra yoggataaya.m-anuruupa.m suruupovahati,  vicchaaya.m-anvaddhamaasa.m, atthaanativattiya.m-yathaasatti, sadisatte, sadiso  kikhiyaa sakikhi, aanupubbiye-anuje.t.tha.m, pacchaadattheanuratha.m,  yugapadatthe-sacakka.m nidhehi.
text.1746: [03] yathaasaddo tulyatthe vattamaano syaadyantena sahekattho na bhavati,  yathaa devadatto tathaa ya~n~nadatto.
text.1748: [03] yaavasaddo-vadhaara.ne vattamaano syaadyantena sahekattho bhavati,  avadhaara.na mettakataa paricchedo, yaavaamatta.m braahma.ne aamantaya, yaavajiiva.m,  avadhaara.neti ki.m? yaava dinna.m taava bhutta.m, naavadhaarayaami kittaka.m  mayaa bhuttanti.
text.1749: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ payyapaa ^a^M0.0119^ea^ bahi tiro pure pacchaa vaa  pa~ncamyaa.
text.1750: [03] pariaadayo pa~ncamyantena sahekatthaa honti vaa, paripabbata.m  vassi devo paripabbataa, apapabbata.m vassi devo apapabbataa,  aapaa.taliputta.m vassi devo aapaa.taliputtaa, bahigaama.m bahi gaamaa,  tiropabbata.m tiropabbataa, purebhatta.m purebhattaa, pacchaabhatta.m pacchaabhattaa,  vetaadhikaaro.
text.1752: [03] anusaddo saamiipye aayaame ca vattamaano syaadyantena sahekattho  hoti vaa, anuvanamasani gataa, anuga"nga.m baaraa.nasii, samiipaayaamesviiti  ki.m? rakkhamanuvijjotate vijju.
text.1754: [03] ti.t.thaguppabhutiini ekatthiibhaavavisaye nipaatiiyante, ti.t.thantii gaavo  yasmi.m kaale ti.t.thagu kaalo, vahaggu kaalo. aayatiigava.m, khaleyava.m,  luunayava.m luuyamaanayavamiccaadi, cyanto pettha kesaa kesi, da.n.daa da.n.di,  tathaa velaappabhaavanatthopi, paato nahaana.m paatarahaana.m, saaya.m nayaana.m  saayanahaana.m, paatakaala.m saayakaala.m, paatamegha.m saayamegha.m, paatamagga.m  saayamagga.m.
text.1755: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ ore pari pa.ti paare majjhe  he.t.thuddhaadho-ntovaacha.t.thiyaa. oraadayo saddaa cha.t.thiyantena sahekatthaa vaa  honti, ekaarantatta.m nipaatanato, orega"nga.m, parisikhara.m, pa.tisota.m,  paareyamuna.m, majjhega"nga.m, he.t.thaapaasaada.m, uddhaga"nga.m, adhoga"nga.m, anthopaasaada.m,  puna vaavidhaanaa `ga"ngaaora' miccaadiipi honti.
text.1757: [03] yadetamatikkantamekattha.m ^a^M0.0120^ea^, ta.m napu.msakali"nga.m veditabba.m,  tathaa cevodaaha.ta.m, vaa kvaci bahulaadhikaaraa, yathaaparisa.m yathaaparisaaya,  sakaaya sakaaya parisaayaati attho.
text.1759: [03] amaadi syaadyanta.m syaadyantena saha bahulamekattha.m hoti gaama.m  gato gaamagato, muhutta.m sukha.m muhuttasukha.m, vuttiyevopapadasamaase  kumbhakaaro, sapaako, tantavaayo, varaaharo. ntamaanaktavantuuti  vaakyameva, dhamma.m su.nanto, dhamma.m su.namaano, odana.m bhuttavaa.
text.1760: [03] ra~n~naa hato raajahato, asinaa chinno asicchinno,  pitusadiso, pitusamo, sukhasahagata.m, dadhinaa upasitta.m bhojana.m  dadhibhojana.m, gu.lena misso odano gu.lodano,  vuttipadenevopasittaadikiriyaayaakhyaapanato natthaayuttatthataa. kvaci  vuttiyeva urago, paadapo. kvaci vaakyameva pharasunaa chinnavaa,  dassanena pahaatabbaa.
text.1761: [03] buddhassa deyya.m buddhadeyya.m, yuupaaya daaru yuupaadaaru, rajanaaya do.ni  rajanado.ni. idha na hoti sa"nghassa daatabba.m. katha.m `etadattho  etadatthaa etadattha'nti? a~n~napadatthe bhavissati.
text.1762: [03] savarehi bhaya.m savarabhaya.m, gaamaniggato, methunaapeto, kvaci  vuttiyeva kammaja.m, cittaja.m, idha na hoti rukkhaa patito.
text.1763: [03] ra~n~no ^a^M0.0121^ea^ puriso raajapuriso. bahulaadhikaaraa  ntamaananiddhaariyapuura.nabhaavatittatthehi na hoti-mamaanukubba.m,  mamaanukurumaano, gunna.m ka.nhaa sampannakhiiratamaa, sissaana.m pa~ncamo,  pa.tassa sukkataa, kvaci hoteva-vattamaanasaamiipya.m, katha.m `braahma.nassa sukkaa  dantaa'ti? saapekkhataaya na hoti. idha pana hoteva `candanagandho,  nadighoso, ka~n~naaruupa.m, kaayasamphasso, phalaraso'ti, phalaana.m titto,  phalaanamaasito, phasaana.m suhito.
text.1764: [03] braahma.nassa ucca.m gehanti saapekkhataaya na hoti, `ra~n~no  paa.taliputtakassa dhana'nti dhanasambandhe cha.t.thiiti paa.taliputtakena  sambandhaabhaavaa na hessati, `ra~n~no go ca asso ca puriso caa'ti  bhinnatthataaya vaakyameva, `ra~n~no gavaassapurisaa raajagavaassapurisaa'ti  vutti hotevekattibhaave.
text.1765: [03] daane so.n.do daanaso.n.do, dhammarato, daanaabhirato. kvaci  vuttiyeva kucchisayo, thala.t.tho, pa"nkaja.m, saroruha.m. idha na hoti  bhojane matta~n~nutaa, indriyesu guttadvaarataa, aasane nisinno, aasane  nisiiditabba.m.
text.1767: [03] visesana.m syaanta.m visessena syaadyantena samaanaadhikara.nena  sahekattha.m hoti, niila~nca ta.m uppala~nceti niiluppala.m, chinna~nca ta.m  paru.lha~nceti chinnapara.lha.m, satthiiva satthii, satthii ca saa saamaa ceti  satthisaamaa, siihova siiho, muni ca so siiho ceti munisiiho,  siilameva dhana.m siiladhana.m.
text.1768: [03] kvaci ^a^M0.0122^ea^ vaakyameva pu.n.no mantaa.niputto, citto  gahapati. kvaci vuttiyeva ka.nhasappo, lohitasaali, visesananti ki.m?  tacchako sappo, ekattheneti ki.m? kaa.lamhaa a~n~no. katha.m  `pattajiiviko, aapannajiiviko, maasajaato'ti? a~n~napadatthe  bhavissati.
text.1770: [03] na~nicceta.m syaadyanta.m syaadyantena sahekattha.m hoti, na braahma.no  abraahma.no, bahulaadhikaarato asamatthatthehi, kehici hoti `apunageyyaa  gaathaa, anokaasa.m kaaretvaa, amuulaa muula.m gantvaa. iisa.mka.laaro,  iisa.mpi"ngaloti `syaadi syaadine'ti samaaso, vaakyameva  vaatippasa"ngaabhaavaa.
text.1772: [03] kusaddo paadayo ca syaadyantena sahekatthaa honti nicca.m  syaadividhivisayato-~nattha, kucchito braahma.no kubraahma.no, iisaka.m u.nha.m  kadu.nha.m, panaayako, abhiseko, pakaritvaa, pakata.m, duppuriso, dukka.ta.m,  supuriso, sukata.m, abhitthuta.m, atitthuta.m, aaka.laaro, aabaddho.
text.1773: [03] (9) ``paadayo gataadyatthe pa.thamaaya''. pagato aacariyo  paacariyo, pantevaasii.
text.1775: [03] (11) ``avaadayo ^a^M0.0123^ea^ ku.t.thaadyatthe tatiyaaya''.  avaku.t.tha.m kokilaaya vana.m avakokila.m, avamayuura.m.
text.1778: [03] nikkhanto kosambiyaa nikkosampi, asyaadividhimhiiti ki.m?  rukkha.m pati vijjotate.
text.1780: [03] ciippaccayanto kiriyatthehi syaadyantehi sahekattho hoti,  maliniikariya.
text.1782: [03] bhuusanaadisvatthe svalamaadayo saddaa kiriyatthehi syaadyantehi  sahekatthaa honti, ala.mkariya, sakkacca, asakkacca. bhuusanaadiisuuti ki.m?  ala.mbhutvaa gato, sakkatvaa gato, asakkatvaa gato, pariyatta.m  sobhanamasobhananti attho.
text.1784: [03] a~n~ne ca saddaa kiriyatthehi syaadyantehi saha bahulamekatthaa  bhavanti, purobhuuya, tirobhuuya, tirokariya, urasikariya, manasikariya,  majjhekariya, tu.nhiibhuuya.
text.1786: [03] aneka.m ^a^M0.0124^ea^ syaadyantama~n~nassa padassatthe ekattha.m vaa  hoti, bahuuni dhanaani yassa so bahudhano, lambaa ka.n.naa yassa so  lambaka.n.no, vajira.m paa.nimhi yassa soya.m vajirapaa.ni, mattaa bahavo  maata"ngaa ettha mattabahumaata"nga.m vana.m, aaru.lho vaanaro ya.m rukkha.m so  aaru.lhavaanaro, jitaani indriyaani yena so jitindriyo, dinna.m  bhojana.m yassa so dinnabhojano, apagata.m kaa.laka.m yasmaa pa.taa  so-yamapagatakaa.lako, upagataa dasa yesa.m te upadasaa, aasannadasaa,  aduuradasaa, adhikadasaa, tayo dasa parimaa.namesa.m tidasaa, katha.m  dasasaddo sa"nkhyaane vattate? parimaa.nasaddasannidhaanaa, yathaa pa~nca  parimaa.namesa.m pa~ncakaa sakunaati, dve vaa tayo vaa parimaa.namesa.m dvattayo  vaasaddatthe vaa dve vaa tayo vaa dvattayo.
text.1787: [03] ^b^dakkhi.nassaa^eb^ ca pubbassaa ca disaaya yadantaraa.la.m  dakkhi.napubbaa disaa, dakkhi.naa ca saa pubbaa caati vaa, saha  puttenaagato saputto, salomako vijjamaanalomakoti attho, eva.m  sapakkhako, atthii khiiraa braahma.niiti atthisaddo vijjamaanatthe nipaato,  kvaci gatatthataaya padantaraanamappayogo, ka.n.tha.t.thaa kaa.laa assa  ka.n.thekaa.lo, o.t.thassa mukhamiva mukhamassa o.t.thamukho, kesasa"nghaato  cuu.laa assa kesacuu.lo, suva.n.navikaaro ala"nkaaro assa  suva.n.naala"nkaaro, papatita.m pa.n.namassa papatitapa.n.no, papa.n.no,  avijjamaanaa puttaa assa avijjamaanaputto, na santi puttaa assa  aputte, kvaci na hoti pa~nca bhuttavanto assa bhaatuno putto assa  atthiiti bahulaadhikaarato.
text.1788: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ tattha gahetvaa tena paharitvaa yuddhe saruupa.m.
text.1789: [03] sattamyanta.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^ tatiyanta~nca saruupamaneka.m tattha gahetvaa  tena paharitvaa yuddhe-~n~napadatthe ekattha.m vaa hoti, kesesu ca kesesu ca  gahetvaa yuddha.m pavatta.m kesaakesi, da.n.dehi ca da.n.dehi ca paharitvaa yuddha.m  pavatta.m da.n.daada.n.di, mu.t.thaamu.t.thi, ``ci viitiyaare'' (3-51) ti ci  samaasanto, ``cismi.m'' (3.66) ti akaaro. tattha teneti ki.m?  kaaya~nca kaaya~nca gahetvaa yuddha.m pavatta.m. gahetvaa paharitvaati ki.m?  rathe ca rathe ca .thatvaa yuddha.m pavatti. yuddheti ki.m? hatthe ca hatthe ca  gahetvaa sakhya.m pavatta.m. saruupanti ki.m? da.n.dehi ca musalehi ca  paharitvaa yuddha pavatta.m.
text.1791: [03] aneka.m syaadyanta.m catthe ekattha.m vaa bhavati. samuccayonvaacayo  itariitarayogo samaahaaro ca ca saddatthaa, tattha samuccayaanvaacayesu  nekatthiibhaavo sambhavati, tesu hi samuccayo a~n~nama~n~nanirapekkhaa  namattappadhaanaana.m katthaci kiriyaavisese ciiyamaanataa, yathaa `dhave ca  khadire ca palaase ca chindaa'ti. anvaacayo ca yattheko  padhaanabhaavena vidhiiyate aparo ca gu.nabhaavena, yathaa `bhikkha~ncara gaavo  caanaye'ti. itaradvaye tu sambhavati, tesu hi  a~n~nama~n~nasaapekkhaanamavayavabhadaanugato itariitarayogo, yathaa  `saariputtamoggallaanaa'ti, assaavayavappadhaanattaa bahuvacanameva.  a~n~nama~n~nasaapekkhaanameva tirohitaavayavabhedo samudaayappadhaano  samaahaaro, yathaa `chattupaahana'nti, assa pana samudaayappadhaanattaa  ekavacanameva.
text.1792: [03] te ^a^M0.0126^ea^ ca samaahaariitariitarayogaa bahula.m vidhaanaa  niyatavisayaayeva honti, tatraaya.m visayavibhaago  nirutthipi.takaagato-paa.nituuriyayoggasena"ngaana.m, niccaveriina.m,  sa"nkhyaaparimaa.na-sa~n~naana.m, khuddajantukaana.m, pacanaca.n.daalaana.m,  cara.nasaadhaara.naana.m, ekajjhaayanapaavacanaana.m, li"ngavisesaana.m,  vividhaviruddhaana.m disaana.m, nadiina~nca nicca.m samaahaarekatta.m bhavati,  ti.narukkhapasusakunadhanadha~n~nabya~njanajanappadaana.m vaa,  a~n~nesamitariitarayogova.
text.1793: [03]   paa.nya"ngaana.m-cakkhusota.m, mukhanaasika.m, hanugiiva.m, chavima.msalohita.m,  naamaruupa.m, jaraamara.na.m. turiya"ngaana.m-alasataalambara.m, murajagomukha.m,  sa"nkhade.n.dima.m, maddavikapaa.navika.m, giitavaadita.m, sammataala.m.  yogga"ngaana.m phaalapaacana.m, yugana"ngala.m. sena"ngaana.m-asisattitomarapi.n.da.m,  asicamma.m, dhanukalaapa.m, pahara.naavara.na.m. niccaveriina.m-ahinakula.m,  bii.laalamuusika.m, kaakoluuka.m, naagasupa.n.na.m. sa"nkhyaaparimaa.na  sa~n~naana.m-ekakaduka.m, dukatika.m, tikacatukka.m, catukkapa~ncaka.m, dasekaadasaka.m.  khuddajantukaana.m kii.tapa.ta"nga.m, kunthakipillika.m, .da.msamakasa.m,  makkhikakipillika.m. pacanaca.n.daalaana.m-orabbhikasuukarika.m, saakunti  kamaagavika.m, sapaakaca.n.daala.m, venarathakaara.m, pukkusa chava.daahaka.m.  cara.nasaadhaara.naana.m-atisabhaaradvaaja.m, ka.thakalaapa.m, siilapa~n~naa.na.m,  samathavipassana.m, vijjaacara.na.m. ekajjhaayanapaavacanaana.m diighamajjhima.m,  ekuttarasa.myuttaka.m, khandhakavibha"nga.m. li"ngavisesaana.m-itthipukha.m,  daasidaasa.m, ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m,  ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m, `laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaa-  sanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'ntipi dissati.  vividhaviruddhaana.m kusalaakusala.m ^a^M0.0127^ea^, saavajjaanavajja.m,  hiinappa.niita.m, ka.nhasukka.m, chekapaapaka.m. disaana.m pubbaapara.m, dakkhi.nuttara.m,  pubbadakkhi.na.m, pubbuttara.m, adharuttara.m, aparadakkhi.na.m, aparuttara.m.  nadiina.m-ga"ngaayamuna.m, mahisarabhu.
text.1794: [03] ti.navisesaana.m-kaasakusa.m kaasakusaa, usiirabiira.na.m usiirabiira.naa,  mu~njapabbaja.m mu~njapabbaja.m mu~njapabbajaa. rukkhavisesaana.m khadirapalaasa.m  khadirapalaasaa, vossaka.n.na.m dhavaassaka.n.naa, pilakkhanigrodha.m  pilakkhanigrodhaa, assatthakapitthana.m assatthakapitthanaa, saakasaala.m  saakasaalaa. pasuvisesaana.m-gajagavaja.m gajagavajaa, gomahisa.m gomahisaa,  e.neyyagomahisa.m e.neyyagomahisaa, e.neyyavaraaha.m e.neyyavaraahaa, aje.laka.m  aje.lakaa, kukkurasuukara.m kukkurasuukaraa, hatthigavaassava.lava.m  hatthigavaassava.lavaa. sakunavisesaana.m-ha.msabalaava.m ha.msabalaavaa,  kaara.n.davacakkavaaka.m kaara.n.davacakkavaakaa, bakabalaaka.m bakabalaakaa.  dhanaana.m-hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m hira~n~nasuva.n.naa, ma.nisa"nkhamuttaave.luriya.m  ma.nisa"nkhamuttaave.luriyaa, jaataruuparajata.m jaataruuparajataa.  dha~n~naana.m-saaliyavaka.m saaliyavakaa, tilamuggamaasa.m tilamuggamaasaa,  nipphaavakulattha.m nipphaavakulatthaa. bya~njanaana.m-saakasuva.m saakasuvaa,  gabyamaahisa.m gabyamaahisaa, e.neyyavaaraaha.m e.neyyavaaraahaa, migamaayuura.m  migamaayuuraa. janapadaana.m-kaasikosala.m kaasikosalaa, vajjimalla.m  vajjimallaa, cetiva.msa.m cetiva.msaa, macchasuurasena.m macchasuurasenaa,  kurupa~ncaala.m kurupa~ncaalaa. itariitarayogo yathaa-candimasuuriyaa,  sama.nabraahma.naa maataapitaro iccaadi.
text.1795: [03] etasmi.m ^a^M0.0128^ea^ ekatthiibhaavaka.n.de ya.m vutta.m pubba.m, tadeva  pubba.m nipatati kamaatikkame payojanaabhaavaa. kvaci vipallaasopi hoti  bahulaadhikaarato, dantaana.m raajaa raajadanto, katthaci kama.m paccaanaadaraa  pubbakaalassaapi paranipaato, littavaasito, naggamusito, sittasamma.t.tho,  bha.t.thalu~ncito. catthe yadekattha.m tattha keci pubbapada.m bahudhaa niyamenti,  tadiha byabhicaaradassaana na vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.
text.1797: [03] catthe samaahaare yadekattha.m, ta.m napu.msakali"nga.m bhavati,  tathaacevodaaha.ta.m, katthaci na hoti `sabhaaparisaayaa'ti ~naapakaa,  aadhipaccaparivaaro, chandapaarisuddhi, pa.tisandhipavattiya.m.
text.1799: [03] ekatthe samaahaare sa"nkhyaadi napu.msakali"nga.m bhavati, pa~ncagava.m,  catuppatha.m, samaahaarassekattaa ekavacanameva hoti, samaahaaretveva  pa~ncakaapaalo puuvo, tiputto.
text.1801: [03] cha.t.thiyekatthe kvaci napu.msakatta.m hotekattha~nca, salabhaana.m chaayaa  salabhacchaaya.m, eva.m sakuntaana.m chaayaa sakuntacchaaya.m, paasaadacchaaya.m  paasaadacchaayaa, gharacchaaya.m gharacchaayaa, amanussasabhaaya napu.msakekatta.m  bhavati brahmasabha.m, devasabha.m, indasabha.m, yakkhasabha.m, sarabhasabha.m,  manussasabhaaya.m pana khattiyasabhaa, raajasabhaa iccevamaadi, kvaciiti ki.m  raajapuriso.
text.1803: [03] napu.msake ^a^M0.0129^ea^ vattamaanassa rasso hoti syaadiisu.  salabhacchaaya.m, syaadiisuuti ki.m? salabhacchaaye.
text.1805: [03] antabhuutassa appadhaanassa ghapassa syaadiisu rasso hoti.  bahumaalo poso, nikkosambi, ativaamoru, antassaati ki.m? raajaa  ka~n~naapiyo, appadhaanassaati ki.m? raajakumaarii brahmabandhuu.
text.1807: [03] antabhuutassa appadhaanassa gossa syaadiisu u hoti. cittagu,  appadhaanassaatveva? sugo, antassaatveva? gokula.m.
text.1809: [03] itthiya.m vattamaanato akaarantato naamasmaa aapaccayo hoti.  dhammadinnaa.
text.1811: [03] nadaadiihi itthiya.m viippaccayo hoti. nadii, mahii, kumaarii,  taru.nii, vaaru.nii, gotamii. (14) ``gotovaa'' gaavii go,  aakatiga.no-ya.m, koro ``ntantuuna.m viimhi to vaa'' (3-36) ti  visesanattho.
text.1813: [03] yakkhaadito ^a^M0.0130^ea^ itthiya.m inii hoti viica. yakkhinii  yakkhii, naaginii naagii, siihinii siihii.
text.1815: [03] aaraamikaadito inii hotitthiya.m. aaraamikinii,  anantaraayikinii, raajinii (15) ``sa~n~naaya.m maanuso'' maanusinii,  a~n~natra maanusii.
text.1817: [03] itthiyamiva.n.nuva.n.nantehi nii hoti bahula.m. sadaapayatapaa.ninii,  da.n.dinii, bhikkhunii, khattabandhunii, paracittavidunii, maatuaadito  kasmaa na hoti? itthippaccaya.m vinaapi itthattaabhidhaanato.
text.1819: [03] ktimhaa~n~nattheyeva itthiya.m nii hoti bahula.m. saaha.m ahi.m  saaratinii, tassaa mu.t.thassatiniyaa, saa gaavii vacchagiddhinii,  a~n~nattheti ki.m? dhammarati.
text.1821: [03] ghara.nippabhutayo niippaccantaasaadhavo bhavanti. ghara.nii,  pokkhara.nii, iissa-tta.m nipaatanaa, (16) ``aacariyaa vaa ya-lopo  ca'' aacarinii, aacariyaa.
text.1823: [03] maatulaadito ^a^M0.0131^ea^ bhariyaayamaanii hoti. maatulaanii,  vaaru.naanii, gahapataanii, aacariyaanii, (17) ``abhariyaaya.m khattiyaa  vaa'' khattiyaanii khattiyaa, nadaadipaa.thaa bhariyaayantu khattiyii.
text.1824: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ upamaasa.mhita sahita sa~n~nata saha saphavaama  lakkha.naadituurutuu.
text.1825: [03] uurusaddaa upamaanaadipubbaa ittiyamuu hoti. karabhoruu,  sa.mhitoruu, sahitoruu, sa~n~natoruu, sahoruu, saphoruu, vaamoruu,  lakkha.noruu, uutiyogavibhaagaa uu brahmabandhuu.
text.1829: [03] viimhi ntantuuna.m to vaa hoti. gacchatii gacchantii, siilavatii  siilavantii.
text.1831: [03] viimhi bhavato bhotaadeso hoti vaa. bhotii bhavantii.
text.1835: [03] viimhi ^a^M0.0132^ea^ puthussa pathavaputhavaa honti. pathavii,  puthavii, .the pathavii.
text.1839: [03] paapaadiihii paraa yaa bhuumi tassaa samaasanto a hoti.  paapabhuuma.m, jaatibhuuma.m.
text.1841: [03] sa"nkhyaahi paraa yaa bhuumi tassaa samaasanto a hoti.  dvibhuuma.m, tibhuuma.m.
text.1843: [03] sa"nkhyaahi paraasa.m nadiigodaavariina.m samaasanto a hoti,  pa~ncanada.m, sattagodaavara.m, sa"nkhyaahitveva? mahaanadii,  nadiigodaavariinanti ki.m? dasitthi.
text.1845: [03] asa"nkhyehi sa"nkhyaahi ca paraaya a"ngulyaa samaasanto a  hoti no ce a~n~napadatthe asa"nkhyatthe ca samaaso vattate.  niggatama"nguliihi nira"ngula.m, acca"ngula.m, dve a"nguliyo samaaha.taa dva"ngula.m,  ana~n~naasa"nkhyatthesuuti ki.m? pa~nca"nguli hattho, upa"nguli, katha.m  ^a^M0.0133^ea^ `dve a"nguliimaanamassaati dva"ngula'nti? naatra  samaaso~n~napadatthe vihito mattaadiina.m lope kate tattha vattate.  a"ngulasaddo vaa pamaa.navaaci saddantara.m, yathaa `sena"ngulappamaa.nena  a"ngulaana.m sata.m pu.n.na.m catuddasa vaa a"ngulaanii'ti.
text.1847: [03] diighaadiihi asa"nkhyehi sa"nkhyaahi ca paramasmaa rattiyaa  samaasanto a hoti. diigharatta.m, ahoratta.m (tto), vassaaratta.m (tto),  pubbaratta.m, apararatta.m, a.d.dhuratta.m, atikkanto ratti.m atiratto, dverattii  samaaha.taa diratta.m (tto), vaa kvaci bahulaadhikaaraa ekaratta.m (tto),  ekaratti, ana~n~naasa"nkhyatthesutveva? diigharattihemanto, uparatti, kvaci  hoteva bahula.m vidhaanaayathaaratta.m.
text.1849: [03] gosaddaa alopavisayaa samaasanto a hoti na ce catthe  samaaso a~n~napadatthe asa"nkhyatthe ca, raajagavo, paramagavo,  pa~ncagavadhano, dasagava.m, alopeti ki.m? pa~ncahi gohi kiito pa~ncagu,  acattheti ki? ajassagaavo, ana~n~naasa"nkhyatthesutveva? cittagu,  upagu.
text.1851: [03] ete saddaa aantaa nipaccante. ratto ca divaa ca rattindiva.m,  ratti ca divaa ca rattindiva.m, daaraa ca gaavo ca daaragava.m, catasso  assiyo assa caturasso.
text.1853: [03] anugavanti ^a^M0.0134^ea^ nipaccate aayaame gamyamaane. anugava.m  saka.ta.m, aayaameti ki.m? gunna.m pa~nchaa anugu.
text.1854: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ akkhismaa~n~natthe. akkhismaa samaasanto  a hoti a~n~natthe ce samaadhasaa. visaalakkho, visaalakkhii.
text.1856: [03] a"ngulantaa a~n~napadatthe daarumhi samaasanto a hoti.  dva"ngula.mdaaru, pa~nca"ngula.m, a"ngulisadisaavayava.m dha~n~naadiina.m vikkhepaka.m daaru.m  vuccate, pamaa.ne tu pubbe viya siddha.m sakharaajasaddaa akaarantaava,  sissopi na dissati, gaa.n.dii vadhanvaati pakatantarena siddha.m.
text.1858: [03] oghaabyatihaare gamyamaane a~n~napadatthe vattamaanato ci hoti.  kesaakesi da.n.daada.n.di, cakaaro ``cismi''nti (3.66)  visesanattho, sugandhi, duggantiiti payogo na dissate.
text.1860: [03] ltuppaccayantehi, itthiyamiikaaruukaarantehi ca bahula.m kappaccayo  hoti a~n~napadatthe. bahukattuko, bahukumaariko, bahubrahmabandhuko,  bahula.mtveva? subbhuu.

text.2025: [03] sattamyantaa ete paccayaa honti bhavatthe, ka.na-kusinaa raaya.m bhavo  kosinaarako, maagadhako, aara~n~nako vihaaro. .neyya-ga"ngeyyo,  pabbateyyo, vaaneyyo. .neyyaka-koleyyako, baaraa.naseyyako,  campeyyako, mithileyyakoti eyyako. ya-gammo, dibbo.  iyagaamiyo, udari-yo, diviyo, pa~ncaaliyo, bodhipakkhiyo,  lokiyo.
text.2027: [03] sattamyantaa bhavatthe .niko hoti, saaradiko divaso, saaradikaa  ratti.
